loans.name: Leoncio De Maria

texts.es: Don Leoncio, un hombre solo debido a que su esposa emigro fuera del país en busca de empleo, el continua con el negocio de las ventas de bisuterías desde hace mucho tiempo, los vende de manera ambulante también cuenta con el apoyo económico de su esposa, así mantienen a sus hijos quienes estudian, está solicitando el noveno crédito para invertir en infraestructura específicamente ampliación de la parte trasera de su casa para dar mejor apariencia y obtener un poco más de espacio, para esto comprara cemento, arena, bloques y hierro, don Leoncio con pocos ingresos ha ido poco a poco haciéndole mejoras a su vivienda reparando techo, divisiones de cuartos, repello de paredes, porque sus deseos es la prosperidad con su familia.
texts.en: Leoncio, a man alone because his wife emigrated abroad seeking employment, continues with the business of selling costume jewelry that he’s been in for some time.  He sells it from place to place and also gets economic support from his wife.  This is how he supports his children who are attending school.  He’s asking for his 9th loan to invest in his infrastructure, especially to expand the rear of the house to give it a better appearance and to get a bit more space.  To do so, he will buy cement, sand, concrete clocks and iron rods.  Leoncio has gradually used his little income to improve his home repairing the roof, dividing rooms, plastering walls because his wish is to have prosperity with his family.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, concrete blocks and iron rods.

loans.name: Yelsin Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yelsin una humilde joven de 24 años de edad, originaria de Granada, madre de 2 hijos entre las edades de 3 y 5 años, la cual una de ella esta estudiando. Ella inicio en el ámbito del comercio  desde muy joven, vendiendo rifas  de formas ambulantes para ganarse la vida y tener ingresos extras, actualmente se dedica a brindar el servicio de nintendo play station en su comunidad desde hace 18 meses, con ayuda de su tía quien se los regalo, ella se siente satisfecha con su negocio, ya que es muy rentable, cuenta con clientes fijos y le genera ingresos a diarios.
Yelsin siente la necesidad de invertir en su negocio para cubrir la demanda de los clientes es por ese motivo que hoy en día esta solicitando el crédito para comprar televisores, disco de juegos, memorias, sillas plásticas, etc. Ella estima que este préstamo le será de ayuda porque podrá comprar equipos que aun no tiene, y  brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, sus planes futuros es ampliar el local para mantener su negocio estable con equipos nuevos
texts.en:
Yelsin is a young, humble, 24-year-old woman from Granada.  She’s the mother of two children aged 3 and 5; one of them attends school.  She started in commerce when still very young selling lottery tickets from place to place to earn a living and to have extra income.  She now decided to provide Nintendo PlayStation service to her community and has been doing so for 18 months with help from an aunt who gave it to her.  She feels satisfied with her business because it’s very profitable; she has regular customers that generate daily income.

Yelsin feels the need to invest in her business to meet customer demand which is why she’s now requesting a loan to buy television sets, game discs, memory sticks, plastic chairs, etc.  She believes that the loan will be of great use to her because she’ll be able to buy equipment she still does not have and provide better customer service.  Her future plan is to expand the locale to keep her business stable with new equipment.

loans.use: to buy television sets, game software, memory sticks, plastic chairs, etc.

loans.name: Ailyn

texts.en:
Ailyn is married and works hard to support her family. She has a restaurant business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from house rentals. Ailyn is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to buy ingredients and utensils for her restaurant business.

Ailyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF and more recently through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and utensils for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Roza

texts.ru: Розе 62 год, вдова, живет с сыном. В качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, Роза с 1969 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 7,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Розы имеется 4 коровы, 4 бычка , 4 жеребца и 10 овец. Перепродажа скота и разведение скота приносит 9,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Роза обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 55,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 бычков. Доходы от кредита Роза планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства за счет покупку скота. В планах у розы купить автомобиль.
texts.en: Roza is 62 years old and is widowed.  She lives with her son.  As the main source of income for her family, Roza has been raising livestock since 1969, having started this business with 7,000 som (KGS).  Today she has four cows, four bulls, four stallions and ten sheep on her farm.  Raising and reselling livestock brings her 9,000 som (KGS) per month.  With the goal of expanding her business further, Roza has turned to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 55,000 som (KGS) to buy two bulls.  With the income from this loan, Roza plans on using it to further improve her farm by purchasing more livestock.  She also plans on purchasing an automobile.

loans.use: to purchase two bulls

loans.name: Sherlet

texts.en:
Sherlet is a 45-year-old married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Sherlet has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 16,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Sherlet has been in business for 20 years. In the future, Sherlet would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio, de 46 años es un hombre a quien siempre le gusto hacerle frente a las circunstancias que se le presentan, es así como pudo salir adelante junto a Ruth de 31 años quien es su conviviente y con quien tiene tres menores hijos, Carol de 16, Shesira de 14 y Abel de 6 años de edad respectivamente, vive a lado de toda su familia en una casa propia en donde hasta ahora el sigue esforzándose mucho pues desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida a cada uno de sus miembros.
Julio, a diario se dirige a los aserraderos ubicados en los alrededores de la ciudad para conseguir madera de buena calidad y de los precios mas bajos para ponerlos a la venta en el mismo lugar donde los compra, tiene clientes que siempre solicitan su mercancía y cuando no tiene no duda en acudir a otro lugar para conseguir lo que le pide su cliente. Lleva en este negocio desde hace 3 años y todo le esta marchando de maravilla. Cumple con esta función todos los días por lo general en las mañanas de lunes a viernes, mientras que los fines de semana ayuda a su cónyuge en la compra y venta de granos y productos alimenticios, para eso se va al puerto de la ciudad a partir de las 4 de la madrugada a comprar directamente a los agricultores todo lo que ofrece a sus clientes, llevan trabajando juntos en este negocio desde hace 7 años.
Agradece que las cosas le están yendo muy bien ya que tiene buenos clientes que a diario lo buscan por la calidad de productos que ofrece, espera seguir trabajando de esta manera y más adelante establecer un pequeño reaserradero.
Con el monto solicitado 3800 soles, comprará mayor cantidad de maderas traslapadas  que son usadas en construcciones de viviendas.
texts.en:
Julio, 46, is a man who has always liked to face circumstances that arise.  This is how he’s been able to continue forward alongside Ruth, 31, who is his spouse and with whom he has three minor children:  Carol, 16, Shesira, 14, and Abel, 6. He lives with his entire family in a house of his own where he continues to date striving to provide each of his family members with a better quality of life.

Julio heads out to sawmills located around the city every day to get good quality lumber at the lowest possible prices to sell them in the same place where he buys them.  He has customers that always request his merchandise and when he does not have it he does not hesitate to go somewhere else to get what his customers request.  He’s been in this business three years and everything is moving along marvelously.  He does this every day usually in the morning from Monday through Friday while the weekends he helps his spouse buying and selling grain and food items.  To do that, he heads out to the city’s port starting at 4am to buy directly from farmers everything he offers to his customers.  They’ve been working together in this business for 7 years.

He is grateful that things are going very well because he has many customers that seek him out daily because of the quality of the products he offers.  He hopes to continue working this way and later on set up a small sawmill.  He will use the requested 3,800 soles to buy larger amounts of treated lumber that’s used to build housing.

loans.use: to buy more treated lumber for home construction.

loans.name: Alrdaey Group

texts.en: Alrdaey group is a group of four ladies who live in Hodeidah, Yemen. Yasmin is a 21-year-old mother of a baby girl, who is 3 months old. She started her work last year as a door-to-door clothing seller, right after her husband's illness. She has applied for a youth loan in order to buy clothes for the winter season. This extra profit will help to start her up for the next season, which in return will help to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy winter clothing for resale

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is from Iraq. He is a single youth client, age 21, who lives with five family members. Three of those family members are employed. Ali is a barber. After gaining experience while working for a long time as an assistant at another barber shop, he opened his own business in 2010. He has good experience in his field and is well known in the surrounding area by his excellent reputation. He is requesting a 1,800 USD youth loan to pay the yearly rent of his shop and to buy a generator. He aims to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide himself with better life conditions.

loans.use: to pay the yearly rent of his shop and to buy a generator

loans.name: Roweida

texts.en:
Roweida is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her son appears in her Kiva profile photo inside the herd.

Roweida is a Palestinian woman. She is married and a mother to two sons and one daughter. Her husband is a worker who gets a small salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs.

For the past five years, Roweida has had her own successful project. She has been raising and selling sheep and sheep products, which has been a profitable project, but she also needs more support to cover some necessary costs.

Roweida is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing more fodder to feed the sheep she is raising and improving the herd's condition. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase fodder for her sheep

loans.name: Karina Isabel

texts.es:
Karina es una mujer de 22 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Karina se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Contabilidad, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Karina trabaja como asistente contable, en una empresa comercial de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Karina se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de la inscripción y mensualidades de sus estudios, de esta manera ella podrá seguir estudiando su carrera profesional,  así pues Karina seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser una gran profesional y al lado de su familia desea salir adelante.
texts.en:
Karina is a 22 year old women who lives in the city of Chinca with her parents and siblings.  She is a very likeable, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to succeed.  Thanks to her hard work and the support of her parents, Karina is studying to earn an accounting degree.  In her free time, she enjoys reading and, on occasion, cooking a very tasty dish of chicken and rice to share with her family.  

Through her own initiative, and with dedication and tenacity, Karina works as an accounting assistance in a local business in her city.  She works everyday from the early morning hours for about eight hours.  She enjoys her work, and she believes she does well because of her hardwork and because she treats everyone well.  

Karina is very thankful for Kiva loans as they will help her to cover the cost of enrollment and monthly payments for her studies.  Because of them, she will be able to continue her professional studies.  She will continue working hard to achieve her biggest dream of being a professional and with her family by her side, she hopes to be successful.

loans.use: to cover the cost of enrollment and monthly payments for her studies.

loans.name: Joyita

texts.en: Joyita is a 28-year-old married woman with two children. She has a plantation where she grows taro, bananas, and yams to sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for three years. Joyita needs a loan to buy another wheelbarrow, a shovel, a rake, several bush knives, weedkiller spray, and more tiapula. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. Joyita will use the profits from her sales to improve her family's assets.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, a shovel, a rake, bush knives, and weed killer spray

loans.name: Mauga

texts.en: Mauga is 40 years old and married with 6 children. She has a plantation where she grows taro, bananas, and yams that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 3 years. Mauga needs a loan to buy another wheelbarrow, a shovel, a rake, some bush knives, weedkiller spray and other farming necessities. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. Mauga will use the profits from her sales to improve her family's assets.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, shovel, rake, bush knives, weedkiller spray, and other farming necessities.

loans.name: Lelava

texts.en: Lelava is 30 years old and married with 3 children. She runs an elei printing business where she prints lava-lava and sells them in her community. She has been doing this for 3 years. Lelava is requesting a loan to buy printing equipment such as paints, brushes, designs, and lava-lava. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. Lelava will use the profits from her sales to improve her family's assets.

loans.use: to buy materials such as paints, brushes, designs, lava-lava and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Nizar

texts.en:
The photo shows Nizar in his garden shop. Nizar is a 47-year-old married man who has no children.

For the past three years, Nizar has had a garden shop. He has been selling different types of seedlings and flowers. He is well known among his customers and has a lot of loyal customers, which makes his project a successful and profitable one. It is the only source of income for him and his wife.

Nizar is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to cover the cost of purchasing a new collection of seasonal seedlings and flowers that customers often request and buy. This will meet the customers' demands and improve Nizar's income, which will help to offer better living conditions to Nizar and his wife.

loans.use: To purchase seedlings and flowers for resale.

loans.name: Litman Javier

texts.es:
Litman es un hombre de 24 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus padres y hermanos, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Litman se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Odontología, en sus ratos libres le gusta tocar guitarra y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Cayhua Rellena para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Litman trabaja como matizador en una empresa constructora de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Litman se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de estudio, tales como resinas, porcelanas, pinzas, jeringas, entre otros; de esta manera Litman contará con las herramientas necesarias para realizar sus prácticas estudiantes par así cursar satisfactoriamente sus estudios, así el seguirá reforzándose por cumplir su gran sueño de convertirse en un buen profesional y tener su propia clínica.
texts.en:
Litman is 24 years old, single, and lives in the city of Ica with his parents and siblings.  He is a very likeable, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to succeed.  Thanks to his hard work and the support of his parents, Litma is studying dentistry.  In his free time, he enjoys playing the guitar and, occasionally, cooking a very tasty dish of stuffed peppers to share with his family.  

Through his own initiative, and with tenacity and dedication, Litman works for a construction company in his hometown.  He works from the early morning hours for approximately eight hours a day.  He is pleased with his work, and he believes that he does well because of his performance and the way that he treats the customers.  

Litman is very thankful for Kiva loans that will allow him to materials for his studies such as resins, tweezers, syringes, and other things.  He will now have the necessary tools to do his clinicals and to satisfactorily complete his studies.  He will be able to continue his efforts towards accomplishing his biggest dream of being a professional and having his own clinic.

loans.use: to buy materials for his studies.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 55 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Editha is borrowing 12,500 PHP (Philippines pesos) through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Editha has been farming rice for 15 years and also earns additional income from buying and selling rice grains.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Lesbia De Los Angeles

texts.es: Lesbia joven madre de dos hijos que estudian y desea que sean grandes profesionales, su marido le apoya con su trabajo como técnico electricista, ella antes trabajaba en un comedor, despues laboro como operaria en una zona franca busco varias opciones de empleo pero no le fue bien, ahora gracias a Dios trabaja en un comedor como copropietaria en conjunto con su mama hace años por el que está muy contenta, este treceavo crédito lo necesita para instalar servicio higiénico, comprara inodoro, tubos, bloques, cemento, hierro, arena para darle mejor acondicionamiento a su hogar al que le ha ido haciendo mejoras poco a poco con sus ingresos y el de su esposo para tener una vida más digna.
texts.en: Lesbia is a young mother of two children who are in school and whom she wants to see become great professionals. Her husband supports her with his job as an electrical technician. She used to work at a restaurant and later worked in a tax-free area looking for various employment opportunities, but it did not go well. Now, thanks to God, she has co-owned a restaurant with her mother for a number of years and is very content. This is her 13th loan, and she needs it to install a bathroom by purchasing a toilet, pipes, blocks, cement, iron and sand to improve her home's condition. Lesbia and her husband have made improvements little by little so they can have a more dignified life.

loans.use: to install a bathroom by purchasing a toilet, pipes, blocks, cement, iron and sand.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood and corrugated iron.

loans.name: Carmen Yessica

texts.es:
Carmen es una mujer de 36 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su hijo de 16 años, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su hijo, ya que ella es padre y madre para él; gracias a su esfuerzo Carmen pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Secretariado Ejecutivo, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Carmen trabaja como secretaria en una institución publica de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen  desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Carmen se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción, tales como arena, cemento y pintura, de esta manera podrá hacer refacciones y mejoras en la vivienda que habita, de esta manera Carmen seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia y ver a su hijo convertido en un buen profesional.
texts.en: Carmen is 36 years old and lives in the city of Chincha, Peru, with her 16-year-old son, whom she loves and is her main reason for living. She is a very kind, hardworking and enthusiastic person who dedicates all her efforts to making headway for her son since she is his sole provider. Thanks to her efforts, Carmen was able to study for an executive secretarial degree, and in her free time she likes to listen to music and on occasion cook a rich dish called Carapulcra con Sopa Seca to share with her family. With a lot of hard work and dedication, Carmen works as a secretary at a public institution in the city. She works every day from the early morning for about eight hours. She enjoys carrying out her work and thinks it is going very well thanks to her good performance and how she treats others. Carmen is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to your support she will be able to purchase construction materials, such as sand, cement and paint, so she can make renovations and improvements to her home. In this way, Carmen will be able to keep working hard to fulfill her biggest dream of having her own home and seeing her son become a professional.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Julia Damiana

texts.es: Doña Julia habita en el barrio 380 muy conocido en Managua, su esposo siempre laborando como conductor, ambos tienen dos hijos que estudian, ella trabaja para ellos brindándoles lo necesario en la vida con su pequeño negocio de venta de totillas de maíz desde hace 3 años labor muy pesado ya que lleva un largo lapso procesar el maíz desde muy tempranas horas y como las ganancias no son lo suficiente también trabaja como empleada domestica en una casa particular, así va progresando en la vida doña Julia, ahora está optando por un 3er crédito para construir un cuarto para que sus hijos estén más cómodos, por lo que necesita comprar arena, cemento, bloques, hierro, piedrines y empezar la obra.
texts.en: Julia lives in a well-known barrio in Managua. Her husband is always working as a driver, and they have two children who are in school. Julia has worked to provide them with life's necessities with her small business selling corn tortillas for the past three years. It is very hard work, since she gets up very early because it takes a long time to process the corn, and the profits aren't enough on their own, so she also works as a domestic servant at a particular home. Now she is requesting her third loan to build a room so her children can be more comfortable, for which she needs to purchase sand, cement, blocks, iron and gravel so she can start the work.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, blocks, iron and gravel.

loans.name: Faamaini

texts.en: Faamaini is 30 years old. She is married and has three children. She has a plantation where she grows taro, bananas, and yams to sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 3 years. Faamaini needs a loan to buy another wheelbarrow, a shovel, a rake, some bush knives, weed killer spray, and more tiapula. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. Faamaini will use the profits from her sales to improve her family’s assets.

loans.use: to buy another wheelbarrow, a shovel, a rake, some bush knives, weed killer spray, and more tiapula.

loans.name: Juvy

texts.en: Juvy is 34 years old. She is married and has two children. She lives in Ozamis City. Juvy helps her family to meet its needs by gaining 5,000 PHP monthly from her gardening business, which she has had for 15 years. In 2011 she became a member of GDMPC, and she is now applying at GDMPC for a loan of 12,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise. Juvy wants to expand her business one day.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Eriolita

texts.en:
Eriolita is 47 years old. She is married and has 5 children. She earns a living as a fish pond (milk fish) operator in the Philippines. Eriolita is borrowing 18,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional feed for her business.
Eriolita has been a fish pond operator for 10 years and also earns additional income from fish vending and pig fattening.
Eriolita successfully repaid her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business as a fish pond operator.
She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed for her business.

loans.name: Satuala

texts.en: Satuala is 69 years old. She is a widow and has 10 children. She has a small garden where she grows taro, bananas, yams, and taamu to sell in her community or at the market. She requests a loan to buy another wheelbarrow, a shovel, other farming tools, weed killer spray, and more tiapula. Satuala has been a member of SPBD since 2012 and joined to gain access to financial services. In the future, she hopes to provide for her family’s financial support by helping with college expenses and by building her family a fixed house.

loans.use: to buy another wheelbarrow, a shovel, other farming tools, weed killer spray, and more tiapula.

loans.name: Alejo

texts.en: Alejo is married with five children. Alejo is 56 years old and lives in Gata Diot, Clarin. He operates a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. He has been doing this for 6 years and every month he earns 3,000 PHP. He has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to repair his existing vehicle for better service. Alejo been a member of GDMPC since 2007. In the future, Alejo hopes to purchase additional motorcycles for his business.

loans.use: to repair his existing vehicle for better service.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es: Doña María tiene 36 años, es casada tiene 4 hijos menores de 17 años que van a la escuela, uno de ellos nació con capacidad diferente a quien le brinda un cuidado especial, recibe apoyo de su esposo que trabaja como guarda de seguridad, ella trabaja en su pequeña pulpería y también con la elaboración de tortillas se ayuda, el préstamo lo requiere para invertir en infraestructura la cual es su principal meta, en esta ocasión hará instalación de tuberías para aguas negras y servicio higiénico, ya puede hacer esta inversión debido a que en su barrio recién han instalado la tubería principal para toda la población, antes no gozaba de este privilegio así obtendrán mayor aseo y comodidad en su vivienda, para esto comprara inodoro, tuvos pvc, cemento, arena, bloques, hierro y pagara la mano de obra, todo esto gracias a Afodenic con los fondos Kiva, por el cual está muy contenta y agradecida.
texts.en:
Maria is 36 years old, married, and has four children under the age of 17 who go to school.  One of them was born with a disability and she provides him special care.  She gets support from her husband, who works as a security officer.  She works in her mini-market and also supports herself by making tortillas.

She needs the loan in order to invest in infrastructure, which is her primary goal.  On this occasion she will have sewage pipes and bathroom plumbing installed.  She is now able to make this investment given that a main sewage pipe was recently installed for everyone in her neighborhood. They did not enjoy this privilege before, and with it they will have better sanitation and a more comfortable home.

She will purchase a toilet, PVC pipes, cement, sand, blocks, iron, and pay for the labor.  

All of this is thanks to Afodonic, with funds from KIVA, which she is very happy and thankful for.

loans.use: to buy a toilet, PVC pipes, cement, sand, blocks, iron and pay for labor.

loans.name: Sara

texts.en: Sara is 25 years old. She is married and has one child. She has a small garden where she grows taro, bananas, yams, and taamu to sell in her community or at the market. Sara needs a loan to buy another wheelbarrow, a shovel, fertilizer, weed killer spray, and more tiapula. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012 and joined to gain access to financial stability. Sara hopes to use her earnings to improve her family’s assets.

loans.use: to buy another wheelbarrow, a shovel, fertilizer, weed killer spray, and more tiapula.

loans.name: Veleala

texts.en: Veleala is 55 years old and married with four children. She owns and operates a business venture, sewing clothes and selling them in her community and to the public. She has three years of experience in this line of business. Veleala needs a loan to buy an electronic sewing machine, more needle packets, thread, more cloth material and so forth. She hopes to use her profits to extend her business and graduate her children from college. She joined SPBD in 2012.

loans.use: to buy cloth material, a sewing machine, needles, thread etc.

loans.name: Roina

texts.en:
Roina is an 18-year-old single lady. She has a small garden where she grows 'ava (the Kava plant, in English), which she can sell to the community. Roina requests a loan to buy a new wheelbarrow, a shovel, rake, bush knives, fertilizer, weed-killer spray and plastic bags. 

Roina has been a member of SPBD since 2012 and joined to gain access to financial stability. In the future, Roina hopes to use her earnings to improve her family assets.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, shovel, rake, bush knives, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Maaola

texts.en: Maaola is 34 years old and married with 8 children. She has a small garden where she grows taro, bananas, taamu and yams which she can sell to the community. Maaola is requesting a loan to buy a new wheelbarrow, a shovel, a rake, bush knives, fertilizer, weed killer spray, tiapula, and other farming implements. Maaola has been a  member of SPBD since 2011; she joined to gain access to financial stability. In the future, Maaola hopes to use her earnings to improve her family's assets.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, shovel, rake, bush knives, fertilizers, weed killer spray, and other items for her farm.

loans.name: Alexander Francisco

texts.es: Alexander joven trabajador que con su esposa se las ingenia para sacar adelante a sus 3 hijos para que vayan a la escuela y se preparen para que tengan un buen empleo, ella es comerciante, el siempre con su labor a diario de taxi desde hace muchos años oficio con el que mantiene a su familia por eso le brinda constantemente manteniento a su vehículo ya que es su medio principal de trabajo, para eso está solicitando apoyo de un tercer crédito para hacerle cambios de anillos, amortiguadores concha de vielas, buchin de tijeras entre otros, para brindar un buen servicio a sus clientes y no interrumpir su viaje con molestos ruidos o detenerse por algún desperfecto mecánico.
texts.en:
Alexander is a hardworking young man who, with his wife, manages to get his three children ahead so they will go to school and have a good job.  She's a merchant and he has always been with his daily taxi job for many years, a trade with which he supports his family.  For this reason he constantly maintains his vehicle because it's his main means of work.

This is why he's requesting the support of a third loan to change the rings, shock absorbers, connecting rod shells, and scissor bushing, among other things.

He'll give his customers good service and not interrupt his trips with bothersome noises or stop because of some mechanical imperfection.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his vehicle

loans.name: Etita

texts.en: Etita is 24 years old and is single with no children. She has a small stall where she grows taro, yams, bananas, and more to sell in her community. Etita needs a loan to buy farming equipment such as a wheelbarrow, a spade, weedkiller, and more to help her with the business. She is a new member of SPBD starting in 2012. Etita hopes to use her earnings to improve her family assets.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, a spade, weedkiller, etc.

loans.name: Marleny

texts.es: Marleny de treinta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; ella posee una fotocopiadora y además para complementar los gastos del hogar también realiza trabajos por computadora y vende artículos escolares, tiene varios años con el negocio y ha ganado una amplia experiencia en el rubro que le permite obtener el máximo de ganancias, esta ubicada en su residencia, es muy conocida y ya tiene mucha clientela quela prefiere por la calidad, los buenos precios y el servicio excelente; Marleny es una mujer que se caracteriza por su amabilidad y honestidad, es totalmente dedicada a su labor, emprendedora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, cada dia se esfuerza al máximo por encontrar esas oportunidades que le permitan llegar al éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda en el negocio y quiere aprovechar a una nueva inversión para no decepcionar a los clientes por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar papelería, tinta de impresora, cuadernos, lápices etc. Marleny tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Marleny is 36 years old and lives with her husband and children in a home of her own.  She has a photo copy business and also sells school supplies via computer in order to help with the household expenses.  She’s been doing this for several years and has gained lots of experience that has allowed her to maximize her profits.  The business is in her home and she is very well known because she has many customers due to the quality, good prices, and excellent service she provides.

Marley is a women known for her friendliness, honesty, and because she is completely dedicated to her work.  She is enterprising and has a great desire to get ahead.  Each day she puts forth her maximum effort to find these opportunities that allow her to succeed.  The demand for her services has increased in recent weeks and she wants to take advantage of it and make a new investment so that she doesn’t disappoint her customers.  She is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL to buy paper goods, ink, notebooks, pencils, etc.  She has a good payment history, is very responsible, and assures us that she will be able to get out of debt and is confident that she will bring financial security to her home.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Me

texts.en:
Me is 52 years old and is married with 6 children. She has a huge plantation where she grows taro, bananas, and yams that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 2 years. Me needs a loan to buy a new wheelbarrow, a shovel, a rake, some bush knives, a weedkiller spray, and more tiapula. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2012 and joined to gain access to financial stability. In the future, Me will use the profits from her sales to improve her family assets.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, a shovel, a rake, bush knives, weedkiller etc.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 22 years old and single. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Josephine has a trisikad transport business in the Philippines. Josephine requested a loan of 12,000 PHP through NWTF to buy spare parts for her trisikad.

Josephine has been in this business for two years. In the future, Josephine would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for her trisikad.

loans.name: Wenceslao

texts.en:
Wenceslao is from Panay Daku, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. He is 62 years old. Wenceslao is married and has 7 children. To make a living, Wenceslao plants, harvests, and sells vegetables, mostly eggplant. Wenceslao has been engaged in his business for 12 years and gets 15,000 PHP a month for these activities. In 2005, Wenceslao joined GDMPC. 

Wenceslao is requesting a loan of 31,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase fertilizer to boost production. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer to boost farming production.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 54 and is separated. She lives in Clarin and operates a general store to earn a living. She has been doing this for 4 years and earns 5,000 PHP each month. Jane been a member of GDMPC since 2007. 

Jane is requesting a 7,500 PHP loan to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps, etc. In the future, she hopes to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Teuila

texts.en: Teuila is 39 years old and married with four children. She has a plantation where she grows taro, bananas, and yams so that she can sell them in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for five years. Teuila needs a loan to buy another wheelbarrow, a shovel, a rake, some bush-knives, weedkiller spray, and more tiapula. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012 and joined to gain access to financial stability. Teuila will use the profits from her sales to improve her family assets.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, shovel, weedkiller, spray, etc.

loans.name: Elpedia

texts.en: Elpedia is married and has three children. Elpedia is 52 years old. She lives in Dela Paz, Clarin. Elpedia owns and operates a plot of farmland, planting and harvesting rice for sale, and she's been in this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns 10,000 PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer to increase production. Elpedia joined GDMPC in 2011. She hopes to be more successful in her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seedlings for the next cropping

loans.name: Motu

texts.en: Motu is 52 years old and married with three children. She has a plantation where she grows taro, bananas, and yams so that she can sell them in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for three years. Motu needs a loan to buy another wheelbarrow, a shovel, a rake, some bush-knives, weedkiller spray, and more tiapula and to pay for her children's school fees. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. Motu will use the profits from her sales to improve her family's assets.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, shovel, rake, bush-knives, weedkiller spray, etc.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is 19 years old and single with no children. She has a plantation where she grows taro, bananas, and yams so that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for three years. Esther needs a loan to buy another wheelbarrow, a shovel, a rake, some bush-knives, weedkiller spray, and more tiapula. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. Esther will use the profits from her sales to improve her family's assets.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, shovel, rake, bush-knives, weedkiller, etc.

loans.name: Gerry

texts.en:
Gerry, a resident of Clarin, Misamis Occidental, is 35 years old, married, and has operated his own motorcycle to earn a living for the past four years, earning an amount of PHP 6,000 each month.

Gerry joined GDMPC in 2011 to gain access to financial services. He is now requesting a loan of PHP 11,000 to purchase a motor headlight and other spare parts for better service. When he gets enough funds, he will buy a vacant lot for farming in order to earn more income.

loans.use: to purchase a motor headlight and other spare parts for better service

loans.name: Susana

texts.en: Susana is 24 years old and married with two children. She has a plantation where she grows taro, bananas, and yams so that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for three years. Susana needs a loan to buy another wheelbarrow, a shovel, a rake, some bush-knives, weedkiller spray, and more tiapula. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. Susana will use the profits from her sales to improve her family's assets.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, shovel, rake, bush-knives, weedkiller spray, etc.

loans.name: Fofoga

texts.en: Fofoga is 21 years old and single with no children. She has a plantation where she grows taro, bananas, and yams so that she can sell them in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for three years. Fofoga needs a loan to buy another wheelbarrow, a shovel, a rake, some bush-knives, weedkiller spray, and more tiapula. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. Fofoga will use the profits from her sales to improve her family's assets.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarow, shovel, bush-knives, weedkiller, etc.

loans.name: Estelita

texts.en:
As a married parent of 6 children, Estelita works hard to support her family.

She buys and sells rice business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from growing rice. Estelita is borrowing 29500 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

Estelita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Lealofi

texts.en: Lealofi is 54 years old and is married with 6 children. She has a small farm where she raises her cattle, which she can sell to the community. Lealofi is requesting a loan to buy another wheelbarrow, a shovel, rake, bush knives, wires, and iron posts. Lealofi has been a  member of SPBD since 2012; she joined to gain access to financial stability. In the future, Lealofi hopes to use her earnings to improve her family's assets.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, shovel, rake, some bush knives, wires, and iron posts.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food production business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 17000 PHP through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Gloria has been in this business for 3 years. She earns additional income from food vending.

Gloria has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.en:
Fortunata is married and works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising pigs. Fortunata is borrowing 12000 PHP through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell for her general store business.

Fortunata has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF and, more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en: Editha is from Butuay, Jimenez. She is 47 years old. Editha is a widow and has 4 children. To make a living, she makes and sells food. She has been engaged in her business for 8 years and earns about 3,000 PHP a month from these activities. In 2007, she joined GDMPC. Editha is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to supplement the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
As a married parent of 4 children, Janet works hard to support her family.

She weaves coconut leaves (used for house repair and construction) in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fishing. Janet is borrowing 12000 PHP through NWTF to buy bamboo, coconut leaves, and other materials for her business. 

Janet has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy bamboo, coconut leaves, and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Nara

texts.en: Nara is married with 5 kids. She is 47 years old and lives in Palilan, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. Nara is a farmer and manages a gardening business to earn a living. She has been doing this for 3 years and every month she earns 3,500 PHP from this work. She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. Nara been a member of GDMPC since 2011. In the future, Nara hopes to improve/expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Adelina

texts.en:
Adelina is 51 years old and married with seven children.

She earns a living by raising hogs in the Philippines. Adelina is borrowing 10000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and medicine for her pigs.

Adelina has been raising hogs for seven years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and medicine for her pigs.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is 31 years old and married with 2 children.

Leah works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 29500 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional canned goods, eggs, noodles, spices, and other items to sell.

Leah has borrowed and paid 22 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 7 years and also earns an income from raising pigs and poultry.

Leah successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her general store and improve her pig and poultry business.

NWTF is relisting Leah's business profile so that lenders can support her efforts to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy additional canned goods, eggs, noodles, spices, and other items to sell.

loans.name: Johna

texts.en: Johna, 49, is married and has four children. She lives in Dinas, Sinacaban. Johna is operating a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members. She has been in this business for 7 years. Each month, she earns 5,000 PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 14,000 PHP to purchase spare parts and accessories for her vehicle. Johna been a member of GDMPC since 2010. In the future, Johna wants to purchase another transport vehicle to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and accessories for her vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 10 bags of cement, 10 kgs of nails, 40 metal sheets and to pay the labourers.

loans.name: Rubhee

texts.en:
Rubhee is 33 years old and married with two children. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Rubhee is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Rubhee has been farming rice for 10 years and also earns additional income from buying and selling unhulled rice.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 58 years old and married with seven children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Erlinda has run a general store in the Philippines for the past nine years and has requested a loan of 20,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy items to sell, such as snack foods, eggs, spices, soap and sugar.

In the future, Erlinda would like to expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy goods to sell such as snack foods, eggs, spices, soap and sugar.

loans.name: Alpha Group

texts.fr: La cliente Habamungu est présidente du groupe d’affaire Alpha, mariée et mère de 8 enfants.  elle vendeuse de tissus au marché de Katindo. Elle s’entraide avec son conjoint dans cette affaire. Elle a commencé cette activité avec  son fonds propre reçu de son mari. Le défi majeur pour elle, c’est la persistance de maladies dans sa famille, les effets de la guerre sur ses activités, les taxes administratives, etc. elle reste optimiste, ainsi, ce nouveau prêt va lui servir d’acheter les articles divers (tissus, habillement pour les juniors, souliers, cartables, etc.). au finish, elle salut le programme Hekima qui continue le soutenir pendant cette période de guerre.Il sied de signaler, une cliente porte son bébé.
texts.en:
Habamungu, the customer, is the leader of the business group Alpha. She is married and the mother of 8 children. She sells fabric at the Katindo market and works together with her spouse in the business. She started the business with her own funds, received from her husband. Her main challenges are the persistent illnesses in her family, the effects of war on her business activities, administrative taxes and other issues. She remains optimistic and will use this loan to buy various items like fabrics, children's clothes, shoes and school bags. Finally, she would like to pay tribute to Hekima's program, which continues to support her during this period of war.

Note: one customer in the photo is carrying her baby.

loans.use: to buy various items; fabrics, children's clothes, shoes, school bags, etc.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Tuvshinjargal

texts.en: Mr.Tuvshinjargal is 40 years old and lives with his wife and two children in a 'ger' in Uvurhangai province of Mongolia. His wife stays home taking care of their daughter Tungalag, age 4 and son Zandanhuu, age 2. This borrower has been running a taxi service business since 2007. He has built a close relationship with his customers. His car has been broken down several times and needs replacement. He is planning to change his car and needs an additional loan of 1,400,000 MNT to purchase an eco-friendly electric and gas consuming car to provide his taxi service business. He is a hardworking, modest and clever man.

loans.use: to purchase an eco-friendly electric and gas consuming car for his taxi service business

loans.name: Benedicta

texts.en:
Benedicta is 46 years old and married with four children. She is from Villalin, Pana-on. Benedicta owns and operates a transportation business, providing transportation services to local community members. She has been in the business for two years and earns 5,000 PHP per month. 

In 2011, Benedicta joined Kiva partner, GDMPC. She is asking for a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase tires and other accessories. Benedicta plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase tires and accessories for her motorbike

loans.name: Alpha

texts.en:
Alpha is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling unhulled rice in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice for her business. Alpha has been in this business for nine years. Alpha earns more income from buying and selling frozen foods and raising livestock.

Alpha has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of unhulled rice to sell

loans.name: Emerenciana

texts.en:
Emerenciana is 60 years old and married with two children.

Emerenciana is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines, and also earns an income from her general store. Emerenciana requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Emerenciana has been raising pigs for 11 years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF and more recently, from Kiva, to sustain her business.

She wants to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Izigirwa Group

texts.fr:
Espérance fait partie du groupe  Izigirwa et   habite à Gitega. Elle  a  40 ans et est mariée à Siméon, un commerçant. Ensemble ils ont  5 enfants, âgés de 5 à 15 ans, qui étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de boutique(riz,haricot, sel,...)   depuis 20 ans. 

Elle  est à son sixième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité d’articles de sa boutique (riz,haricot, sel,...)  à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Le gain de son commerce, lui permet de satisfaire les besoins familiaux (soins de santé, alimentation, habillement…).
texts.en: Espérance is part of the Izigirwa group and lives in Gitega. She is 40 years old and married to Siméon, a merchant. The couple have 5 children together, aged between 5 and 15 years old, who are studying. She has been selling groceries (rice, beans, salt) in her shop for 20 years. This is her 6th loan from Turame. Her Kiva-sponsored loan will increase her capital and enable her to buy a large quantity of items (rice, beans, salt, etc.) to resell in her shop, so that she can earn more money. The profits generated by her business allow her to satisfy her family's needs (health, food, clothing, etc.).

loans.use: to buy a large amount of groceries (rice, beans, salt, etc.) for her shop.

loans.name: Leoniel

texts.en:
Leoniel, a 25-year-old, is a married entrepreneur from San Roque, Panaon. He earns money from his transport service business, which he has operated for three years now. He earns 5,000 PHP a month. 

To improve his transport business, Leoniel is borrowing 10,000 PHP from GDMPC, which he joined in 2011, to buy accessories and tires. Before long, he hopes to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy accessories and tires.

loans.name: Tungalag

texts.en:
Mrs.Tungalag is 58 years old. She lives with her husband and son in a ger in the province of Uvurhangai in Mongolia. Her husband, Malidii, works part-time as an interior designer. Her son, Bayarsaihan, stays at home. 

Mrs.Tungalag has been helping her husband run his seasonal business in interior designing services. She has worked as a tailor for years in the past. She is now starting her own tailoring service business at home. 

Mrs.Tungalag is now requesting 4,000,000 MNT to purchase inventory and an automatic sewing machine to start her tailoring business. She is a hardworking, optimistic and diligent woman.

loans.use: to purchase inventory and an automatic sewing machine for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Gema

texts.en:
Gema is married with 2 children. She is 45 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Gema is a farmer who also grows pigs to earn a living. She has been doing this for 10 years. She has requested a loan to finance her rice production. 

Gema has been a member of PMPC for almost 11 years.

loans.use: to finance her rice production.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is from Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is 53 years old. Patricia is a widow who has one child. To earn a living, Patricia buys and sells fruits and vegetables. Patricia been in this business for 21 years and earns 2,500 PHP a month from these activities. 

Patricia is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell. In 2008, Patricia joined GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 45 years old and married with five children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Elizabeth has an abaca-weaving business in the Philippines. Elizabeth has requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy raw materials for her business.

Elizabeth has been in this business for three years. In the future, Elizabeth would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her abaca-weaving business.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
Margarita is married with one child. She is 34 years old and lives in Guintomoyon, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. 

Margarita owns a plot of farm land, where she plants bananas to earn a living. She has been in this business for two years and earns PHP 3,000 each month. She has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase farm chemicals. 

Margarita has been a member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC, since 2012. In the future, Margarita's plan is to save her profits in order to buy a car.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals.

loans.name: Unyenyekevu Group

texts.fr: La cliente Kavira , leader du groupe d’affaire «Unyenyekevu », est entrepreneur, âgée de 55 ans, veuve, mère de 10 jeunes enfants, qui étudient tous. Son mari est décédé récemment suite a une maladie brutale, Elle est vendeuse de sacs à main (second hand). Il y a 5 ans qu’elle exerce ces petites activités. Cependant, elle vient d’obtenir son 13eme crédit de Hekima. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir de s’approvisionner avec 1 ballon de sacs, etc. En plus, elle souhaite voir ses enfants grandir, accroître son entreprise et acheter une seconde parcelle qu’elle léguera en héritage à ses enfants. La cliente remercie Hekima pour ses actions en faveur de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.
texts.en:
Kavira, the customer and leader of the business group Unyenyekevu, is a 55-year-old entrepreneur. She is a widow and the mother of 10 young children, who are all studying. Her husband recently died after a sudden illness.

Kavira has been selling second-hand handbags for 5 years. She has just received her 13th loan from Hekima, which should allow her to buy a bale of handbags and other items. She would like to watch her children grow up, to increase her business and to buy a second plot of land which she will bequeath to her children.

The customer thanks Hekima for its actions in aid of poor women excluded from regular banks.

loans.use: to buy a bale of handbags and other items.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Guljan

texts.ru: Гулжан 52 года, замужем. Дети Гулжан взрослые, работают и живут самостоятельно.По характеру Гулжан человек очень спокойный и трудолюбивый. В 1990 году после распада СССР, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, Гулжан начала свой бизнес в животноводстве со стартовой суммой в 5,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря настойчивости и упорному труду, Гулжан сумела развить свой бизнес с ежемесячным доходом в 10,000 сом (KGS) от продажи молока и молочной продукции.В связи с тем, что Гулжан предстоит улучшить материальное положение детей,появилась потребность расширения хозяйства,для того чтобы увеличить доходы семьи Гулжан обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) для приобретения 2 бычков. В последующем, с помощью коров она сможет увеличить надои молока.
texts.en:
Guljan is 52 years old and married. Guljan's children are adults, and they work and live by themselves. Guljan is very calm and hardworking by character. 

After the collapse of the Soviet Union in 1990, in search of a source of income for the family, Guljan started her business of livestock breeding with a starting sum of 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to perseverance and persistent work, Guljan was able to expand her business to a monthly income of 10,000 som (KGS) from the sale of milk and dairy products. 

As Guljan would like to improve the financial situation of her children, she needs to expand the business, in order to increase the income of the family. Guljan turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 30,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of two bulls. In the future, with the help of the cows, she will be able to increase the milk production.

loans.use: To purchase two bulls

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 61 years old and married with four children, one of whom is in school. She has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for ten years. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

 She requested a PHP 22,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials needed for her abaca weaving.  In the future, Lucia would like to save enough to provide financial stability for her family.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her abaca weaving.

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en: Tessie is 52 years old and lives in Landing, Baliangao. She is married with 3 children. To earn a living, Tessie has a business selling snacks. She earns about PHP 2,700 each month doing this type of work. She has a requested a loan to purchase ingredients needed to make a product to sell. Tessie has been a member of PMPC for almost 8 years.

loans.use: To purchase raw ingredients needed to make a product.

loans.name: Anarkul

texts.ru: Анаркул 57 лет, замужем, воспитала детей, которые сейчас проживают отдельно. Анаркул в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, на протяжении последнего года  занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 30,000 сом (KGS ). Благодаря упорному труду Анаркул в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 теленка, 10 голов мелкого рогатого скота ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Анаркул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 45,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 1 коровы. Доходы от кредита Анаркул планирует вкладывать в развитие бизнеса посредством покупки коров для увеличения доходов от продажи молока.
texts.en:
Anarkul is 57 years old, married, and has raised children who currently live by themselves. As a main source of income for her family, Anarkul has over the last year been engaged in livestock breeding, after having started this business with a sum of 30,000 som (KGS). Thanks to persistent work, Anarkul currently has two calves and ten heads of sheep and goats on her farm. The monthly income from the business is around 20,000 som (KGS). 

With an aim to further develop her business, Anarkul turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 45,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of a cow. Anarkul plans to invest the income from the loan in developing the business through purchasing cows to increase the income from the sale of milk.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora works hard to support her family. She is married and has a firewood retail business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 6 years.
She requested a PHP 21,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell. In the future, Leonora would like to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is 52 years old and lives in Sapang Ama, Sapang Dalaga. She is married with seven children. 

Leonora has a lumber business and earns approximately PHP 4,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to pay for logs. 

Leonora has been a member of PMPC for almost seven years.

loans.use: to pay for ten logs.

location.town: Calamba-Sapang Ama Sapang Dalaga Misamis Occidenta

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional stock like sardines, biscuits, soap, etc to sell in her general store business.

Josephine has been in this business for one year; she earns additional income from vegetable vending and raising pigs.

Josephine has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like sardines, biscuits, soap, etc to sell.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is 51 years old and has three children. She is married, and has two children who are in school.

Juliet is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed for her livestock.

Juliet has been raising livestock for seven years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Juliet would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her livestock.

loans.name: Dieudonné

texts.fr:
Dieudonné, célibataire sans enfant et sans autre personne en sa charge, est âgé de 25 ans. Il est né au Rwanda  et a fréquenté l’école jusqu’en 6ème  année de  l’enseignement secondaire.
Il est commerçant d’une mini papeterie.
Il a commencé de collaborer avec ACB Ltd en 2012. Le cycle actuel est le 5ème pour lui.
 Avec le crédit lui octroyé, il va augmenter  la quantité des articles qu’il vend dans sa mini papeterie (2 paquets de cartouche 15A, 6 perforateurs, 3 cartons des cahiers, etc.)
N’attendant aucune difficulté de non remboursement de ce prêt, Monsieur Dieudonné a l’ambition d’accroitre davantage sa papeterie en y ajoutant beaucoup d’articles de façon que tout ce que le client désirera soit trouvé dans sa papeterie. Pour sa famille, il va assurer les frais scolaires des membres de sa familles (frères et sœurs).
texts.en:
Dieudonné, who is single and has no children or other dependents, is 25 years old. He was born in Rwanda and went to school until the 6th year of secondary school. He has a small stationery shop. 

He started working with ACB Ltd in 2012 and this is his 5th loan cycle. He will use the loan he receives to increase the inventory of his small stationery shop with items including 2 packets of 15A cartridges, 6 hole punches and 3 cartons of exercise books. 

He expects to have no difficulty in repaying this loan and aims to increase his business by adding a lot of new products so that the customer can find everything he/she wants in his shop. He plans to take care of his family by covering his brothers' and sisters' educational expenses.

loans.use: to restock with 2 packets of 15A cartridges, 6 hole punches, 3 cartons of exercise books, etc.

loans.name: Bahodur

texts.ru:
Баходур обратился в МДО «Арванд» чтобы получить кредит и увеличить поголовье скота.   Он женат и имеет детей. Его вид деятельности заключается в откармливании скота.   Баходур содержит дома несколько голов скота.   Эта основная его работа , в их селе откорм скота и выращивание сель-хоз. культуры являются очень актуальными , поэтому он всерьез занимается этим делом, чтобы прокормить свою семью.
   Для этого он хочет получить кредит в Арванде, чтобы купить несколько голов скота и продолжить развивать свой бизнес. Баходур очень благодарен организации Кива за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Bahodur turned to MDO Arvand in order to receive a loan and increase the number of livestock. He is married and has one child. His business activity is fattening cattle. 

Bahodur has several heads of livestock. This is his main work. In his village fattening cattle and growing agricultural crops is very relevant. Therefore, he works seriously with this activity, in order to feed his family. For this, he would like to receive a loan from Arvand, in order to purchase some heads of livestock and continue developing his business. 

Bahodur is very thankful to Kiva for the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en: Angelina is 45 years old and lives in Potungan, Dapitan City. She is married with 6 children. She has a charcoal business and also sells copra (dried coconut meat). She earns approximately PHP 3,500 each month doing this type of work. She has a requested a loan to finance her business. Angelina has been a member of PMPC for almost 6 years.

loans.use: To buy copra (dried coconut meat) and charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Tegshjargal

texts.en:
Mrs.Tegshjargal is 30 years old and lives with her husband and 2 children in an apartment in Govi-Altai province of Mongolia. Her husband works at a local company as a supervisor. Her daughter, Anujin, age 5, goes to the local primary school and her son, Moron, age 2, goes to the local kindergarten. 

Tegshjargal had been working in a local market for years before she gave birth to her children. She has been staying home taking care of her children until now, and is planning to start her own business of selling curtains at a local market. She is requesting 2,000,000 MNT to import curtains from Erlian, China, to sell at the market. She is a hardworking, well-experienced and friendly woman.

loans.use: to import curtains from Erlian, China, to sell at the local market.

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.en: Anastacia is married with 5 children. She is 50 years old and lives in San Isidro, Calamba. She sells grocery items to earn a living and has had this business for 6 years. Each month, she earns about PHP 2,600 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase additional inventory to sell. She has been a member of PMPC for almost 7 years.

loans.use: To purchase 10 boxes of grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Ma. Fe

texts.en:
Ma. Fe is a married woman with 8 children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Ma. Fe is 43 years old; she has 2 children who are in school.

Ma. Fe has a fish-vending business in the Philippines;  she has been in this business for 2 years. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional fish to sell.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fish to sell.

loans.name: Bernarda

texts.es: Bernarda de 42 años de edad casada y tiene 8 hijos, ella se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de tejidos tipicos desde hace 5 años, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la elaboracion de tejidos tipicos ya que nececita mas capital para trabajar y seguir con su negocio, ya que de esa forma es como ayuda a su esposo con los gastos de la casa.
texts.en:
Bernarda is 42 years old, married, and has eight children. She has been producing and selling traditional woven items for five years.

Bernarda is requesting a loan so that she can buy raw materials for making traditional woven products. She needs more operating capital so that she can continue her business. This will enable her to help her husband with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy materials for producing woven items.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is 49 years old and married with 5 children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell, like soft drinks, snack foods, canned goods, etc..

She has borrowed and paid 6 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 21 years and also earns an income from food vending. Evangeline aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell like soft drinks, snack foods, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: Jasmin

texts.en: Jasmin is married with 2 children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 33 years old and has 2 children who are in school. Jasmin has an ice cream vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 5 years. She requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her business. In the future, Jasmin would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Erdenechimeg

texts.en:
Mrs. Erdenechimeg, 53 years old, lives with her mother, husband and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in their house on her mother’s plot of land. Her husband works as an assistant cook at a coal and gold mine. Her mother has retired from work and gets a pension. Her elder son currently works in Korea in accordance with a labor contract, and has been living there for two years. She herself works as a salesperson at a private business entity. Her work includes, but is not limited to, selling oil and lubricant materials, automobile equipment, etc. 

Over the years, the house they live in has deteriorated and needs some serious interior repair and replacement, including high quality windows and a door. So, she is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to purchase construction materials as well as new windows and a door. As a result, the house heating system can be updated and the family can live in a more comfortable and warm place. Most importantly, due to having a heat-preserving house, the family will burn less coal, thus contributing to the efforts against air pollution.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Ailene

texts.en:
Ailene is 29 years old and lives in Pta. Miray, Baliangao. She is married with one child. 

 Ailene works in the fishing industry and catches and sells fish for a living. She has been doing this for six years. Ailene has requested a loan to purchase fishing materials. 

Ailene has been a member of PMPC for almost five years.

loans.use: To purchase fishing materials and other gear

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is 54 years old and married with six children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Rebecca runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks like detergent, biscuits and other groceries needed for her business. Rebecca has been in this business for one year.

In the future Rebecca would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock like detergent, biscuits and other groceries needed for her business

loans.name: Faavae

texts.en: Faavae is a 40-year-old woman who is married with three children. She runs a small taxi business to earn a living. Faavae needs a loan to buy four new tyres for her taxi. She will use her profits to support her family. Faavae joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: To buy four new tyres for her taxi

loans.name: Fualaau

texts.en: Fualaau  is a 34-year-old married woman with three children. She would like to start growing taro, bananas, and yams to earn a living. Fualaau has requested a loan to buy new equipment such as a wheelbarrow, a spade, an axe, chemicals, bush-knives, etc. She has been a member of SPBD for one year. Fualaau will spend her profits for her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow,  a weed sprayer, chemicals, bushknives, etc.

loans.name: Sofai

texts.en: Sofai is a 42-year-old woman who is married with three children. She has a small garden where she grows taro, bananas, yams, etc. Sofai needs a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, a weed sprayer, and chemicals. She will use her profits to save for her kids school fees. Sofai joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, a weed sprayer, chemicals, bushknives, etc.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 45 years old and lives in Delapa, Sibutad. She is married with six children. 

Erlinda has a tailoring business and earns approximately PHP 2,500 each month doing this type of work. She has a requested a loan to purchase tailoring materials. 

Erlinda has been a member of PMPC for almost two years.

loans.use: To purchase tailoring materials (cloth, thread, zippers, etc.)

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
Margie is 35 years old and married with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Margie has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy raw materials for her abaca weaving business.

Margie has been in this business for five years. In the future, Margie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her abaca (natural fiber) weaving business.

loans.name: Furkat

texts.ru:
Фуркат 48-летний мужчина, у него большая семья, имеет пятерых детей.  Он   занимается животноводством и разведением скота с юных лет.    В этом бизнесе ему помогают жена и дети. 
 Для улучшения жизнедеятельности он планирует взять зеленый кредит и приобрести энергосберегающую печь, так как это печка многофункциональная и греет комнату в зимние холода.   На нем можно  готовит еду и в духовке можно печь лепешки, пироги. К тому же это печь не имеет вреда для здоровья.     Фуркат очень рада, что у него будет возможность приобрести  такую печь.  Они живут в сельской местности, поэтому им необходим был  такой выбор, так как дров и угля достаточно.
 Фуркат с семьей очень благодарны организации Кива за возможность осуществить свои планы.
texts.en:
Furkat is a 48 years old man. He has a large family, with five children. He works with livestock breeding and has bred cattle from a young age. His wife and children help him in this business. To improve life, he plans to take a green loan and purchase an energy efficient furnace, as this stove is multifunctional and heats the room in the winter cold. It is possible to prepare food on it and in the oven it is possible to bake cakes and pies. In addition, this oven does not harm the health.
