Junior es un hombre de 31 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su esposa y sus tres hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con el apoyo de su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Junior pudo estudiar una pequeña terrera técnica de Computación Tecnológica, lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo culminarlos, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Junior trabaja como operador de maquinas en una empresa textil de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Junior se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada comprara de materiales de construcción, como arena, cemento, tubos y otros, de esta manera Junior podrá realizar la construcción de la fachada y la parte delantera de su vivienda, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de culminar sus estudios profesionales.
texts.en:
Junior is a 31 year old man.  He lives in the city of Chincha with his wife and three children whom he loves and are most important in life.  He is friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic.  With the support of his wife they work very hard to come out ahead.  Thanks to his hard work and the support of his parents, Junior was able to partially study computer technology.  Unfortunately, because he lacked the financial resources he was not able to finish his studies.  In his free time he likes to play soccer with his friends and sometimes he will cook a delicious Carapulcra con Sopa Seca to share with is family.

Determined and dedicated, Junior works as a machine operator of a textile factory in his city.  He works every day from early in the morning for ten hours.  He feels good about his job because he is dedicated and treats others with respect.   

Junior is very grateful with Kiva lenders.  With this loan he will purchase construction materials like sand, cement, tubes and others to build the facade and front of his home.  He will continue to work hard and dedicate himself so that he can accomplish his goal of finishing his professional studies.

loans.use: Para la compra de materiales de construcción

loans.name: Oksana

texts.ru: Оксана работает воспитателем в детском садике. Она любит детей и любит свою работу. У Оксаны есть хобби - готовить различные изысканные кулинарные блюда. Недавно старшая дочь Оксаны вышла замуж. Оксана хочет сделать ей подарок - купить новую мебель в спальную комнату дочери. Для этого Оксана просит предоставить ей кредит в размере 5,000 гривен.
texts.en:
Oksana works in a kindergarten. She loves children and her job. Oksana has a hobby: preparing various delicious culinary specialties. 

Recently, Oksana's eldest daughter was married. Oksana wants to make her a gift -- to buy new furniture for her daughter's bedroom. To do this, Oksana is requesting a loan of 5,000 hryvnia.

loans.use: to purchase bedroom furniture

loans.name: María Lucia

texts.es:
María tiene 40 años de edad, es madre soltera de siete hijos. Desde muy joven, ella se dedica a la crianza de pollos en pequeña escala y gracias a unas capacitaciones que recibió en su comunidad sobre la elaboración de artesanías (hamacas) ella también se dedica a este rubro desde hace dos años, todo lo realiza para sostener a sus hijos. 

Para comprar los pollos y los insumos para la elaboración de las hamacas, ella debe abordar dos autobuses, el viaje tarda aproximadamente una hora y lo hace en compañía de uno de sus hijos

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 150 pollos de engorde, concentrado para su alimentación y $200 para comprar insumos para elaborar las hamacas. Con la inversión, ella dispondrá de suficientes insumos para continuar con sus negocios y recibiendo los ingresos necesarios para mejorar su calidad de vida; ya que manifiesta que le es muy rentable. Su propósito, es ahorrar para brindarles el estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María is 40, she is a single mother with seven children. From a very young age, she undertook small-scale chicken rearing and thanks to training that she received in the community for the manufacture of handcrafted goods (hammocks). She has also been working in this field for the last 2 years, everything she does is to support her children.

To buy the chicken and supplies to make hammocks, she needs to take two buses, the journey takes approximately one hour and is accompanied by one of her children.

The loan María is seeking from Fundación Campo is to buy 150 broiler chicken, chicken feed and $200 to buy supplies to make hammocks. As she says that this is very profitable, with the investment, she will have enough supplies to continue with the businesses and gain the income needed to improve her quality of life. Her aim is to save to enable her children to have an education.

loans.use: to buy 150 broiler chicken, chicken feed and $200 to buy supplies to make hammocks.

loans.name: Mykhailo

texts.ru: Михайло женат, имеет двое детей. Михайло работает фельдшером в сельской больнице. Он любит свою работу и справляется с ней очеь хорошо. Вместе с женой Михайло выращивает огурцы и помидоры на своем участке и получает в летний сезон дополнительную прибыль. Михайло хочет купить недорогой автомобиль и ему не хватает 5,000 гривен для этого. Автомобиль нужет Михайлу, чтобы было проще добираться в соседний населенный пункт на работу.
texts.en:
Mihailo is married and has two children. Mihailo works as a medical assistant in a rural hospital. He loves his work and copes with it very well. Together with his wife, Mihailo grows cucumbers and tomatoes on his own plot of land and gets more revenue in the summer season. 

Mihailo wants to buy an inexpensive car and he lacks 5,000 hryvnia for this. Mihailo needs a car to make it easier to get to the next town for work.

loans.use: to buy an automobile

loans.name: Efrain

texts.es: Don Efrain ahora es padre de dos hermosos hijos menores de edad a los que apoya en conjunto con su esposa para que estudien y sean personas de bien en la vida, el siempre continua con su trabajo de oficial de la policía profesión que le ha dado para mantener a su familia y poder pagar sus créditos, con este 14avo crédito invertirá en infraestructura para su casa con la puesta de verjas y paredes, comprara cemento, bloques, hierro, arena y  verjas ya elaboradas, a como puede Efraín va poco a poco modificando su hogar para verla bonita y en orden gracias a los financiamientos, para que en un futuro sus hijos vivan cómodos y orgullos de sus padres.
texts.en: Efrain is now father to two beautiful young children who he supports together with his wife so that they can study and become upstanding people in life. He continues to work as a police officer which has enabled him to provide for his family and be able to pay his loans. With this 14th loan, Efrain will invest in his home's infrastructure to set up railings and walls: he will buy cement, blocks, iron, sand and ready-made railings so that he can modify his home little by little to make it pleasing to the eye and more organized all thanks to the financing. All of this so that in the future his children can live comfortably and be proud of their parents.

loans.use: to buy cement, blocks, iron, sand and ready-made railings.

loans.name: Ivan

texts.ru: Иван является пенсионером, живет вместе со своей женой в частном доме. Их дети уже выросли и разехались и теперь Иван хочет немного улучшить свои жилищные условия. Он просит предоставить кредит для покупки мебели и небольшого ремонта в одной из жилых комнат. Иван - общительный человек и любит принимать гостей у себя дома. Он надеется, что после ремонта гости будут приходить к нему чаще.
texts.en:
Ivan is retired and lives with his wife in a private home. Their children are already grown and living on their own, and now Ivan wants to improve their living conditions a little. 

He is asking for a loan to buy furniture and small repairs in one of heir living rooms. Ivan is a sociable person and loves to receive visitors at home. He hopes that after the repair guests will be coming to visit him often.

loans.use: to buy furniture and to make small repairs in his living room

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Yosyp

texts.ru: Йосип работает оператором конвеерной линии на предприятии пищевой промышленности. Живет сам в частном доме. В качестве дополнительного источника дохода выращивает кролей на продажу. Йосип хочет простроить гараж для своей машины, чтобы она не стояла на улице. Для этого он просит предоставить ему кредит в размере 8,000 гривен. Йосип надеется, что благодаря гаражу машина будет меньше ржаветь и прослужит дольше.
texts.en:
Yosyp works as a conveyer line operator for food industry enterprises. He lives alone in a private home. As an essential source of income, he raises rabbits for sale. 

Yosyp wants to build a garage for his car, so that it is not standing on the street. For this, he is requesting a loan of 8,000 hryvnia. 

Yosyp hopes that because of the garage the car will rust less and will last longer.

loans.use: to build a garage for his car

loans.name: Victor

texts.ru: Виктор работает на консервном заводе в г. Виноградово. Живет вместе со своей женой и двумя детьми в частном доме. Виктор просит предоставить ему кредит для улучшения жилищных условий. Он хочет купить новую мебель на кухню - шкафы, полочки, стол и мягкий диванчик. Виктор - заядлый рыбак. Он ему очень нравиться хотить на рыбалку и приностиь домой хороший улов.
texts.en:
Victor works at a cannery in Vinogradovo. He lives with his wife and two children in a private home. Victor is asking for a loan to improve their living conditions. He wants to buy new furniture for the kitchen - cabinets, shelves, a table, and a soft sofa. 

Victor is an avid fisherman. He really likes to go fishing and to bring home a good catch.

loans.use: to buy kitchen furniture

loans.name: Rosa Elena

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer de 47 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago con su esposo y sus tres hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con el apoyo de su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Rosa no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Educación que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocina y en algunas ocasiones prepara un riquísimo Seco de Carnero para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Rosa trabaja como obrera de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Rosa se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos del tramite documentario para que su hijo mayor pueda obtener su título profesional, de esta manera Rosa seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de brindarles una buena educación y ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales y en hombres de bien.
texts.en:
Rosa is a mother of 47 years of age, she lives in the city of Ica, in the district of Santiago with her husband and her three children, whom she loves and who are her main reason for living. She is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person who, together with the support of her husband, devotes all her efforts to get their family ahead. Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources, and because of the need to work to pay off her costs, Rosa was unable to study the career in Education she had wanted, but she very much would have liked to have been able to. 

In her free time, Rosa likes cooking and sometimes she makes a delicious dish of Seco de Carnero to share with her family. At her own initiative, with a lot of dedication and determination, Rosa works as a field worker in an agricultural foundation in her city. She works every day from the early hours in the morning and she can work for approximately 10 hours. She enjoys her work and thinks that it is going well thanks to her performance and thanks to her friendly treatment of others.

Rosa is very grateful to the Kiva loan lenders as it is thanks to the help given that she will be able to cover the costs of the paperwork so that her elder son can obtain his degree. In this way, Rosa will continue to work and make efforts to make her greatest dream a reality: that of giving her sons a good education and seeing them become true professionals and upstanding men.

loans.use: to cover the costs of her children's studies.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
En el distrito de la Venta, distrito caracterizado por  sus grandes paisajes de color verde debido a la agricultura que se desarrolla en la zona, vive Julio, un hombre muy trabajador que poco a poco ha ido saliendo adelante a pesar de las adversidades, Julio  vive al lado de su esposa y de sus 2 hijos, Tal es así que Julio hace hasta lo imposible por brindarles lo necesario para salir adelante y su sacrificio diario es por darle las oportunidades que él no tuvo. Es así que cada día el trabaja como Albañil, él labora alrededor de 8 horas al día, pero en ocasiones puede trabajar un poco mas dependiendo del tipo de construcción que realice; él  cree que está saliendo adelante en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y cuidadoso con su trabajo.

Julio está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá construir un baño en su domicilio, ya que actualmente solo tiene una letrina, así el podrá  mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguir cada día trabajando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena profesión a sus hijos y ver su casa terminada completamente”.
texts.en:
Julio lives in the district of La Venta, which is characterized by great green landscapes due to the agriculture which is developed in the area. Julio is a very hardworking man who has achieved success little by little, in spite of adversity. 

Julio lives with his wife and two children. He does everything in his power to provide what is necessary for them to succeed, and he makes sacrifices daily so that they can have the opportunities that he never had. For this reason, he works every day as a construction worker. He works for about 8 hours a day, although sometimes he works more depending on the type of construction he is doing. He believes that he is successful because he is very responsible and thorough in his work.

Julio is very grateful for the Kiva lenders, because thanks to their help he will be able to construct a bathroom in his home. Currently he only has a latrine, so he will now be able to improve his family's quality of life. He will continue working every day to make his greatest dream come true: for his children to have a good profession and to see his house completely finished.

loans.use: to construct a bathroom.

loans.name: María Magdalena

texts.es:
María tiene 36 años de edad, es casada y tiene cinco hijos. Ella se dedica al comercio de frutas y verduras en su casa y de forma ambulante por los cantones del pueblo en el vehiculo que posee su esposo, también posee un puesto de venta en el pueblo que lo abre los días sábados. Tiene más de cinco años de dedicarse a este negocio, empezó por iniciativa propia y de su esposo, debido a que instalaron una tienda de productos básicos en su casa y vieron que la demanda era buena y así fueron comprando más mercadería y saliendo a vender. Antes, solo se dedicaba a realizar los oficios domésticos en su casa y solo su esposo trabajaba transportando personas en una mototaxi.

La mercadería para su tienda, la compra en la ciudad y viajan los días lunes y viernes en el vehiculo de su esposo. Para vender de manera ambulante se tardan aproximadamente una hora y media. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para pagar los tramites de liberación de la tarjeta del vehiculo anterior de su esposo, ya que esta como garantía de un préstamo que solicito, para comprar el vehiculo que actualmente posee. De esta manera, podrá agilizar los trámites ya que su esposo no posee el dinero suficiente para realizarlo. Además, evitara que su esposo le devuelva el dinero al comprador del carro anterior. Su deseo, es trabajar muy fuerte para ya no tener deudas y trabajar con capital propio.
texts.en:
36-year old María is married and has five children. She earns her living selling fruit and vegetables from her house and from her husband’s vehicle in the streets of the town where she lives. She also has a stall which she opens on Saturdays. María has had this business for over five years. It was her own and her husband’s idea to start it, and they began by opening a store in the house selling basics. As demand was high, they bought more merchandise and ventured into the streets to sell it. Before that María was occupied with household duties, and her husband ran a motortaxi business.

She buys products for her store in the town and travels there on Mondays and Fridays in her husband’s vehicle. This delays their selling time by an hour and a half.

The loan she is seeking from Fundación Campo is to pay for the release documentation of a vehicle previously owned by her husband. This will then act as a guarantee for a loan that she is seeking to buy their current vehicle. In this way the paperwork will be speeded up. Her husband doesn’t have enough money to do it himself. As well it will avoid her husband having to return the money to the purchaser of the previous car. 

María’s goal is to work very hard so that she has no debts and can buy merchandise with her own money.

loans.use: pay for the release documentation of a vehicle previously owned by her husband

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es:
Ronald es un hombre de 26 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, en el distrito de Aguaytia, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Ronald no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniera Civil, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Ronald trabaja en su pequeño cultivo de plátano, el cuenta con una pequeña parcela donde trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su esfuerzo y dedicación.
Ronald se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de abono y fertilizantes para su cultivo, de esta manera Ronald desea obtener una buena cosecha, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante y lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Ronald is 26 years old and single. He lives in the city of Pucallpa, in the district of Aguaytia. He is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to overcome. 

Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources and the need to begin working to cover expenses, Ronaldo was not able to study civil engineering as a professional degree, but he would have very much liked to do so. In his free time, he likes to play soccer, and sometimes he cooks a delicious chicken and rice dish to share with his family.

By his own initiative, and with plenty of effort and dedication, Ronald has a small crop of bananas. He has a small plot where he works every day for 10 hours, beginning in the early morning. He is happy with his work and he believes that it is going well because of his effort and dedication.

Ronald is very grateful for the Kiva lenders, because thanks to their help he will be able to buy manure and fertilizer for his crops, which he hopes will help him obtain a good harvest. He will continue working and putting in effort to succeed and achieve his dream of having his own house.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Roberto Carlos

texts.es:
Roberto es un hombre de 40 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su esposa y su hijo, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Roberto no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ceviche para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Roberto trabaja como albañil en el rubro de la construcción, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por los buenos acabos y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
 Roberto se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción, como arena, cemento, ladrillos y otros, los cuales le  ayudaran de mucho para hacer el techado de su vivienda, de esta manera brindara mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de terminar la construcción de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Roberto is 40 years old. He lives in the city of Chincha with his wife and son, whom he loves and who are his main reason for living. He is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person who dedicates all of his efforts towards providing for his family.

Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources and the need to begin working, Roberto could not study a professional degree, but he would have very much liked to do so. In his free time, he likes to watch television, and sometimes he cooks a delicious Ceviche (a marinated seafood dish) to share with his family.

By his own initiative and with plenty of effort and dedication, Roberto makes a living as a construction worker. He works for about ten hours every day, beginning in the early morning. He is happy with his work and he believes that it is going well because he has finished his projects well and because he treats his clients in a friendly manner.

Roberto is very grateful for the Kiva lenders, because thanks to their help he will be able to buy construction materials, such as sand, cement, bricks, and others. These will help him to construct the roof of his house. He will then be able to provide his family with better security and well-being. He will continue working and putting in effort to make his greatest dream come true: to finish construction on his house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Marina Luz

texts.es: La Sra. Marina tiene 53  años, casada se dedica a la venta de perfumes y colonias y cosméticos por catalogo,  es promotora de productos de belleza ella vende de manera ambulante visitando instituciones públicas y privadas, barrios distintos domicilios ofreciendo sus productos, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, La Sra. Marina va a usar este préstamo  para comprar perfumes y colonia por mayor que se encuentran en promoción para tener en stock para su  negocio,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es tener variedad de productos para  satisfacer a sus  clientes, La Sra. Marina enfrenta retos en su negocio que son atender  con eficiencia a sus clientes y va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar su calidad de vida de su familia ya que esta es la única actividad que le permite mantenerse y salir adelante  sola.
texts.en:
Marina is 53 years old. She makes a living selling perfume, cologne, and cosmetics from a catalog as a beauty products promoter. She is a traveling saleswoman, visiting public and private institutions, neighborhoods and homes to offer her products.

This loan will be her second with the institution. Marina will use this loan to buy wholesale perfume and cologne, which are on special offer, so that she will have them in stock for her business. Her reason for applying for this loan is to have a variety of products to satisfy her clients.

The challenge which Marina confronts in her business is serving her clients efficiently. She will use the earnings to improve her family's quality of life, because this is the only source of income which allows her to maintain herself and succeed alone.

loans.use: to buy wholesale perfume, cologne, and other cosmetics.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es: La Sra. Lucia sigue con la misma actividad del tejido de mantas  conversando con ella nos conto  que le fue muy bien con el crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de lana para el tejido y ahora incremento su producción, ahora en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de lana de alpaca por mayor para el tejido de mantas ya que en este último tiempo incremento su clientela.
texts.en: Sra. Lucia still earns her living weaving fabric. She tells us that all went well with the last loan which she used to buy wool for weaving. She also increased production. Now she is again seeking a loan to buy alpaca wool at wholesale prices since recently the number of customers for the fabric she weaves has increased.

loans.use: to buy alpaca wool to weave fabric by hand

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is a 35-year-old married woman and a mother of three young children. She is from Talibon, Bohol. 

Merlinda owns and operates a tricycle transport business. Her husband uses it to earn a living. 

Merlinda is asking for a loan to buy spare parts like nuts, bolts and fuel for the tricycle. With this, they will be able to maintain the good working condition of the vehicle.

loans.use: to buy spare parts like nuts, bolts and fuel for the tricycle.

loans.name: Maritza Magda

texts.es: Doña Maritza clienta habitante del barrio memorial Sandino de Managua,  su esposo la apoya con todo en el hogar así ambos sacan adelante a sus 4 hijos menores de edad quienes estudian y su deseo es verlos unas personas exitosas, buenos profesionales, ella continua comercializando  sus productos de accesorios para celulares y anteojos de sol, desde muy joven lleva creciendo con esta labor un poco desgastante ya que tiene que estar bajo el sol de pie para ir al pendiente de la clientela que va pasando, este quinto crédito solicitado es para invertirlo en su pequeño negocio con mas productos de los antes mencionados.
texts.en:
Sra. Maritza lives in the neighbourhood of Sandino de Managua. Her husband helps with all household chores, and they both help their four young children with their studies etc. Their wish is to see them become successful people with good jobs.

Maritza continues to run her business selling cell phone accessories and sunglasses. She’s been doing this work since she was very young and is now a little tired from being out in the sun and on her feet all the time attending to her customers. 

This is her fifth loan and she wishes to invest in her business by buying more products like the ones already mentioned.

loans.use: buy cell phone accessories and sunglasses

loans.name: Jose Carlos

texts.es:
En el distrito de Santiago, distrito caracterizado por  sus grandes paisajes de color verde debido a la agricultura que se desarrolla en la zona, vive Jose, un hombre muy trabajador y de condición humilde que poco a poco ha ido saliendo adelante a pesar de las adversidades, sobre todo porque vive al lado de su esposa y de sus 3 maravillosos hijos los cuales tiene 8,6 y 1 añito y por ello Jose, Tal es así que Jose hace hasta lo imposible por brindarles lo necesario para salir adelante y su sacrificio diario es por darle las oportunidades que él no tuvo. Es así que cada día el trabaja como tractorista, es decir el ofrece sus servicios para realizar el arado de las tierras de cultivo de los agricultores de la zona, él labora alrededor de 8 horas al día pero cuando hay campañas de cultivo trabaja algunas horas mas y con ello tener un ingreso extra; él  cree que está saliendo adelante en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y cuidadoso con su trabajo.

Jose está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda ya que actualmente su casa es de adobe (especie de ladrillo pero hecho de barro), y con este apoyo podrá ir construyendo su vivienda de a pocos de material noble (ladrillo y cemento),así el podrá  mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguir cada día trabajando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena profesión a sus hijos y ver su casa terminada completamente”.
texts.en:
In the district of Santiago, a district characterized by its great green landscapes due to the agriculture that flourishes in the region, lives Jose, a hardworking humble man that little by little has been getting ahead despite adversity. This is especially because he lives at the side of his wife and 3 marvelous children, who are 8, 6 and 1 years old. Jose does whatever it takes to provide for them what they need to get ahead, and this daily sacrifice is to give them the opportunities that he never had. Thus, he works everyday as a tractor driver. In other words, he offers his services to plow the cropland of the farmers in the area. He works about 8 hours a day, but when there are agricultural campaigns he works extra hours, and with this has some extra income. He thinks that he is getting ahead in this work because he is very responsible and careful in his work.
Jose is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help they have provided, he will be able to make the improvements to his home. Currently, his house is made of adobe (a kind of brick made of mud) and with this support, he will be able to work on constructing his home little by little of superior material (brick and cement). In this way, he will be able to improve his family’s quality of life and to continue working everyday to make his biggest dream, “to give his children good careers and to see his house completely finished”, a reality.

loans.use: to improve his home.

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es: Don Sergio tiene 53 años de edad, casado, tiene 3 hijos y vive en una aldea del municipio de las Flores, Lempira. El tiene 15 años de dedicarse al cultivo de café, pero desde pequeño se ha dedicado a la agricultura. La cosecha la vende a los intermediarios de la zona. Con ODEF a obtenido tres ciclos de prestamos, con el actual que es por 10,000 Lempiras y los va invertir en la compra de fertilizantes para sus cultivos y también para pago de trabajadores en el corte de café. Los préstamos le han ayudado a darle mejor asistencia a sus cultivos y a sacar buenas cosechas. Tiene como meta a futuro comprar otro terreno para ampliar sus cultivos y obtener más ingresos.
texts.en:
Sergio, age 53, is married and has three children.  He lives in a village in the municipality of Las Flores, Lempira.

He has been growing coffee for 15 years.  However, he has been farming since he was little.  He sells the harvest to intermediaries in the area.

He has had three loan cycles with ODEF.  He will use the current loan for 10,000 lempiras to buy fertilizers for his crops.  He will also pay workers to pick the coffee.  The loans have helped him give better care to his crops and to get good harvests.

His goal for the future is to buy another piece of land in order to expand his crops and to get more income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his crops and to pay workers to pick the coffee.

loans.name: José De La Cruz

texts.es: Don Jose tiene 62 años de edad, soltero, vive en el municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara junto a sus tres hijos. Don Jose realiza su propia actividad de negocio para generar ingresos. Anteriormente trabajaba en transporte con un bus escolar y hace tres años decidió dedicarse a la comercialización  de agua purificada  en botellón y en bolsa. Las ventas son a domicilio, compra y distribuye el producto a personas particulares y pulperías, el utiliza una motocicleta para la distribución. El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 7,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar agua para incrementar su inventario y aumentar las ventas. Tiene como plan llegar a formar una microempresa distribuidora de agua para generar ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Jose is 62 years old and single.  He lives with his three children in the municipality of Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara.  He has his own business activity in order to generate income.

He used to work in transportation with a school bus.  Three years ago he decided to devote himself to selling purified water in large bottles and in bags.  

He sells door-to-door.  He buys and distributes the product from individuals and grocery stores.  He uses a motorcycle for the delivery.

He will use the requested loan for 7,000 lempiras to buy water in order to increase his inventory and increase sales.

He has a plan to become a small business water distributor in order to generate income for his family.

loans.use: to buy purified water to sell.

loans.name: María Consuelo

texts.es:
María tiene 52 años de edad, es casada y tiene dos hijos. Ella tiene 20 años de experiencia en la crianza de ganado de engorde, junto a su esposo aprendieron el oficio, debido a la situación de desempleo y su escaso nivel de estudio, encontraron en el engorde de novillos su única fuente de ingresos para subsistir junto a su familia.  

La señora viaja en un camión desde su casa, hasta el lugar en donde compra el ganado que es el tiangue durante una hora, luego lo escogen y lo comprar para regresarse a su casa el viaje tarda una hora de ida y otra de vuelta. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar cinco novillos para repastarlos durante un periodo de tiempo y luego venderlos. Con la inversión, ella estará segura de continuar con su negocio ya que estos animales los venderá y recibirá un ingreso para su familia. Su deseo, es construir su casa de ladrillo para tener mayor espacio y comodidad, debido a que vive en una casa de adobe.
texts.en:
María is 52 years old, is married and has 2 children.  She has 20 years of experience in raising and selling livestock.  Along with her husband she learned the profession due to a situation of unemployment and her low level of education.  They found that raising and fattening young cows was their only source of income to keep the family sustained.

She travels in a truck from her home to the place where the livestock is bought, which is a small market an hour away.  Later the cows are chosen and bought and they return to the house.  The trip lasts one hour each way.

The loan she is requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy five young cows to graze them for a period and then sell them.  With the investment, she is certain that she can continue with her business now that she will sell the animals and receive an income for her family.  Her desire is to build a brick house to have more space and comfort, since she lives in an adobe house.

loans.use: to buy five young cows to have them graze for a period of time and then sell them.

loans.name: El Milagro 1 Group

texts.en: Lorenza is the group coordinator for El Milagro (The Miracle) 1. This group is located in the city of Hato Mayor. Her home is a compound for her two children. She is taking care of them alone, since she is a single mother. Lorenza has successfully completed six years of loans with Esperanza and this is her eleventh loan. She sells shoes, clothes and accessories from her home and by walking around her community and others. She would like to continue expanding her business by increasing her inventory to access more clients and sell more products. She will use this loan to buy many pairs of shoes, sandals, sneakers, and other types of shoes, as well as clothes and women's accessories. Lorenza says she enjoys doing business and her most important dream is to finish building her house, which she started by saving her profits after she started her business almost six years and a half ago with her first Esperanza loan. She thanks you all for your support!

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes and accessories.

loans.name: Magdalenys

texts.es: Magdalenys, tiene 46 años de edad, soltera, vive con su hermana en una colonia de San Pedro Sula. Anteriormente ella trabajaba en una empresa gubernamental. Y  hace año y medio con sus propios ahorros inicio su  negocio de venta de productos lácteos como quesos, mantequilla, quesillo y cuajada, además vende carne de pollo, refrescos y jugos. Su negocio lo tiene establecido en un local que alquila en el centro de la ciudad. El préstamo que ha decidido obtener es por 5,500 Lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de más productos lácteos y carnes para mantener surtido el negocio. Su sueño es establecer otro puesto de su negocio para expandirse más y generar más ingresos para ayudar a sus hermanos.
texts.en:
Magdalenys is 46 years old, single, and lives with her sister in a district of San Pedro Sula. Previously she worked at a government enterprise and a year and half ago, with her own savings, started her business selling dairy products such as cheeses, butter, quesillo (a stringy Honduran cheese) and curd. She also sells chicken, soft drinks and juices. 

She has set up her business in a shop that she rents in the center of the city. The loan she has decided to get is for 5,500 lempiras and she is going to invest it in the purchase of more dairy products and meats in order to keep her business stocked. 

Her dream is to set up another location of her business so that she can expand and generate more income to help her siblings.

loans.use: To buy cheese, butter, quesillo (a stringy Honduran cheese), curd and meats to sell.

loans.name: Adilia Azucena

texts.es:
Doña Adilia es una humilde señora de  63 años de edad, originaria de la Concepción, Departamento de Masaya, pero tiene 52 años de residir en Managua, viuda, solo finalizo la primaria, madre de 4 hijos mayores de edad, de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de pulpería. Inicio en el ámbito del comercio,  vendiendo fresco, hielos y helados, hace 3 años a raíz del fallecimiento de su esposo, se sintió sola  y sin ingresos, fue por eso que decidió emprender el negocio de pulpería, el cual le resulta muy   rentable y a la vez le genera mejores ganancias ya que ha podido subsistir  a diario con  su familia, en el negocio recibe el apoyo de su hija, cuenta con otros ingresos como es la pensión  por viudez que recibe, sus expectativas es ampliar su pulpería.
Ella esta solicitando el préstamo para comprar arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite, lapicero, cuadernos, gaseosa, etc. Todos los productos que necesita para surtir aun más su pulpería, ya que ella piensa que este crédito le ayudaría a crecer en inventarios,  con el  propósito  de incrementar sus ventas , para obtener mejores ganancias, una de sus metas es acondicionar la infraestructura del local en donde tiene su negocio para dar una mejor presentación al local.
texts.en:
Adilia is a modest woman of 63. She is from Concepción in Masaya department, but she has been residing in Managua for 52 years. A widow, she only completed primary school. She is the mother of four adult children and is a merchant. She has a small general store business. 

As a result of her husband's passing, she started in business three years ago, selling homemade fruit drinks, ices and ice cream. She felt alone and without income. That is why she decided to launch a general store business which has turned out to be very profitable. It generates more income, enabling her to support herself and her family. She gets her daughter's help with the business, and has other income such as the widow's pension that she receives. She hopes to expand her general store. 

She is applying for the loan to buy rice, sugar, beans, cooking oil, pens, notebooks, soft drinks, etc. These are all the products she needs to stock her general store even more, as she believes that this loan would help her increase her inventory, with the aim of increasing her sales to obtain better earnings. One of her goals is to equip her store's infrastructure to improve its appearance.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, beans, cooking oil, pens, notebooks, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Ana Aracely

texts.es:
Ana de 43 años de edad, originaria de Managua, con conocimientos académicos de secundaria, casada, madre de 3 hijos entre las edades de 12, 16 y 22 años, actualmente 2 de ellos están estudiando y el otro trabaja, de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de pulpería. Inicio  sus actividades laborales hace 4 años, vendiendo verduras  en su casa, y con las ganancias que le genero el negocio, decidió emprender otro negocio como es el de la pulpería, con ayuda de su esposo quien viaja a Honduras a trabajar y le manda dinero  para ayudarle con los  gastos del hogar. A pesar de la difícil situación económica que existe ha podido salir adelante y mantener su pulpería estable. 
Ana esta requiriendo el financiamiento  para comprar arroz, azúcar, frijoles, cuadernos, lapiceros, gaseosa, etc. Para comprar toda la mercadería necesaria que aun no tiene en existencia y poder satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, sus planes es establecer otro negocio como es la venta de ropa, su meta próxima es mejorar la infraestructura del local.
texts.en:
Ana, age 43, is from Managua, and she has a high school education.  She is married and has three children, ages 12, 16, and 22.  Two of them are now going to school, and the other one works.

She is a merchant, and she has a grocery store business.  She started her work activities four years ago by selling vegetables at her house.  With the income generated by the business, she decided to undertake another business, the grocery store.  She did this with help from her husband.  He travels to Honduras to work, and he sends her money to help with the household expenses.  In spite of the existing financial situation, she has been able to get ahead and to keep her grocery store stable.

Ana needs a loan to buy rice, sugar, beans, notebooks, pencils, and soft drinks, etc.  She needs to buy all of the merchandise that she still does not have.  She also needs to be able to satisfy her customers' needs.

Her plan is to establish another business like selling clothes.  Her next goal is to improve the infrastructure of her place.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, beans, notebooks, pencils, and soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Neris Adain

texts.es:
Neris tiene 23 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene un hijo. Él se dedica a la crianza de ganado de repasto, oficio que aprendió de su abuelo desde que era un niño. Actualmente esta estudiando ingeniería agronómica en un plan especial que se llama a distancia. La crianza de ganado sea convertido en la única fuete de ingresos para Neris y mantener a su familia y a su estudio, debido a que tiene pocas posibilidades de obtener un empleo formal. 

Él viaja en un camión desde su casa, hasta el lugar en donde compra el ganado que es el tiangue más cercano durante una hora, luego lo escogen y lo comprar para regresarse a su casa el viaje tarda una hora de ida y otra de vuelta. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar tres novillos para repastarlos durante un periodo de tiempo y luego venderlos. Con la inversión, espera que sus ingresos mejoren para terminar sus estudios y conseguir un empleo mejor y ayudar aún más a su familia.
texts.en:
Neris is 23 years old. He lives with his partner and has a son. He raises beef cattle, an occupation he learned from his grandfather at a young age. 

Currently he is studying agricultural engineering through a special plan called "distance-learning". Raising cattle has become Neris' only source of income, and it is how he supports his family and pays for his studies. This is due to the fact that he has little chance of obtaining formal employment.

He travels on a bus for an hour from his home to the place where he buys the cattle, which is the closest market. Then he selects them and buys them so that he return home. The trip takes an hour each way.

The loan he is applying to Fundación Campo for is to buy three steers, so that he can fatten them for a period of time and then sell them. With the investment he hopes that his income improves so that he can finish his studies, get a better job, and help his family even more.

loans.use: To buy three steers to fatten for a period of time and then sell.

loans.name: Nhadeska Suyen

texts.es:
Nhadeska, 27 años de edad, originaria de Managua, casada, madre de 3 hijos entre las edades de 5,8 y 10 años respectivamente actualmente están estudiando, de oficio comerciante, se dedica al taller de costura. Inicio  en el ámbito del comercio desde muy joven, vendiendo bisutería con capital propio, pero este negocio no le genero muchas ganancias, fue allí que decidió trabajar en un taller de costura  en donde fue adquiriendo experiencia y total dominio del negocio, ya que miro que es muy rentable que le genera ingresos a diario, decidió emprender su propio negocio con ayuda de su esposo y 2 empleadas que le ayudan con la costura.
Ella esta solicitando el financiamiento para comprar una maquina de coser industrial. Ella estima que este préstamo le ayudaría a comprar su maquina, para poder entregar sus encargos de ropa a tiempo a sus clientes , con el propósito de hacer crecer su negocio y poder ofrecer su ropa en los supermercados, su meta próxima es incrementar su trabajo para tener ingresos extras.
texts.en:
Nhadeska, 27, is a native of Managua.  She is married, and is the mother of 3 children aged 5, 8, and 10, who all attend school.  She is a merchant who has a sewing workshop.  She had an ambition to become a businesswoman from the time that she was very young.  She started selling costume jewelry with her own capital, but this business did not generate much profit, so she decided to work in a sewing workshop to gain experience and master the business.  She saw that this business was very profitable and would generate daily income, so she decided to start up her own business with the help of her husband and 2 employees who help her with the sewing.

Nhadeska is requesting a loan to buy an industrial sewing machine.  She thinks that this loan, by helping her to buy a new machine, will enable her to deliver her clothing orders on time to her customers.  This will make her business grow, and enable her to offer her clothing for sale in the supermarkets.  Nhadeska's next goal is to increase the amount of work she has so that she can have extra income.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine

loans.name: Lubov

texts.ru:
Любовь работает на консервном заводе. У нее есть один сын. Муж умер несколько лет назад и Любовь растила сына сама. Сейчас сын готовится к свадьбе и Любовь хочет помочь ему начать новую семейную жизнь. Он хочет подарить ему мебель в спальную комнату, для чего и просит предоставить ей кредит в размере 8,000 гривен.
Любовь - умелая домохозяйка и очень любит печь различные сладости, которыми она угощает гостей и соседей.
texts.en:
Lubov works at a canned food factory. She has one son. Her husband died some years ago, and Lubov had to raise her son on her own. Now her son prepares to get married, and Lubov would like to help him set up his own household. She would like to give him a present of bedroom furniture, which is why she is asking a loan in the amount of 8,000 UAH.

Lubov is a skillful homemaker and enjoys baking various sweet treats which she offers to her guests and neighbors.

loans.use: to buy bedroom furniture.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru: Светлана занимается выращиванием овощей в теплицах. Предыдущий кредит помог Светлане выростить хороший урожай и успешно его реализовать. В этот раз Светлана такеж просит предоставить ей кредит для развития ее бизнеса. Ей нужно провести систему полива, закупить оставшуюся часть семян и удобрений, а также она хочет построить еще одну теплицу. Таким образом, Светлана планирует получить дополнительный доход с продажи ранних редиса, помидоров, баклажан,  перца, огурцов и улучшить благосостояние своей семьи.
texts.en: Svetlana grows vegetables in greenhouses.  Her prior loan helped Svetlana to grow a good harvest and sell it successfully.  This time Svetlana is also asking for a loan to expand her business.  She needs to install a watering system, purchase the remaining part of the seeds and fertilizer and also she would like to build one more greenhouse.  This way Svetlana plans to earn an additional profit from the sale of radishes, tomatoes, eggplant, peppers, and cucumbers and to improve her family's well-being.

loans.use: to install a watering system and to expand her greenhouse business

loans.name: Oleg

texts.ru:
Олег занимается выращиванием овощей в теплицах. Благодаря предыдущему кредиту он смог расширить свой тепличный бизнес и вырастить хороший урожай. В этот раз Олег просит предоставить ему кредит для закупки семян и удобрений, а также ремонта существующих теплиц (новая пленка) и строительства дополнительной теплицы.
Благодаря этому Олег сможет получить увеличить свой доход с продажи ранних помидоров, картофеля,  капусты, огурцов и улучшить благосостояние своей семьи.
texts.en:
Oleg grows vegetables in greenhouses.  Thanks to his prior loan he was able to expand his greenhouse business and have a good harvest.  This time Oleg is asking for a loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer and to also repair existing greenhouses (new film) and build additional greenhouses.

Thanks to this Oleg will be able to increase his income from the sale of early tomatoes, potatoes, cabbage, and cucumbers and improve the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to expand his greenhouse business

loans.name: Tamara

texts.ru: Тамара занимается выращиванием овощей в теплицах. Предыдущий кредит помог Тамаре расширить тепличный бизнес и выростить хороший урожай. Тамара хочет развиваться дальше и в этот раз просит предоставить ей кредит для постройки еще одной теплицы, а тажке закупки семян и удобрений. Таким образом, Тамара планирует увеличить свой доход с продажи огурцов, перца и капусты. Бизнес является единственным источником дохода для Тамары.
texts.en:
Tamara grows vegetables in greenhouses.  Her previous loan helped her to expand her greenhouse business and to get a good harvest.  She would like to further expand her activity and, this time, she is asking for a loan to build an additional greenhouse and to buy some seeds and fertilizers.  

By taking this loan, Tamara is planning to increase her revenue through the sale of cucumbers, peppers and cabbage.  Her farming business is her only source of income.

loans.use: to expand her greenhouse farming business.

loans.name: Elsa Claudina

texts.es:
Elsa es una mujer de 36 años, nació en un hogar con problemas económicos por lo que alcanzó a cursar la escuela primaria. Se casó muy joven y se dedicó a los quehaceres del hogar. La falta de educación le impidió también conocer sobre planificación familiar, por lo que tuvo su primer hijo todavía en la adolescencia y ahora tiene 3 hijos de los cuales 2 ya son independientes y ella aún educa al menor. Y ayuda en lo que puede a sus hijos mayores cuando requieren su apoyo. Su esposo Oswaldo de 43 años trabaja como albañil contratista, por lo que a veces cuando no hay obras en las que tenga que trabajar, los ingresos son escasos.  Elsa vive con su esposo y su hijo en la  Parroquia de Río Verde, un lugar histórico de Santo Domingo, la capital de la Provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, una provincia de Ecuador que en los últimos años ha tenido un alto crecimiento sostenido. Su capital  es una ciudad en donde lo más atractivo y llamativo son sus deliciosas frutas, y la gastronomía que ofrecen en el lugar. También cuenta con un comercio considerable  ya que se ha convertido en un puerto terrestre de intercambio comercial entre las regiones Sierra y Costa del país. Además cuenta con varios atractivos turísticos que acompañados de su clima cálido son muy concurridos por turistas nacionales y extranjeros. Es por esto que la mayoría de sus habitantes han emprendido con alguna actividad comercial o de servicios para habitantes y turistas. 
Elsa al ver la necesidad en su hogar decidió aportar emprendiendo en la venta de cosméticos y bisutería desde hace 6 años. Ella realiza sus ventas de manera ambulante visitando cada día a sus clientes. Ahora va aumentar en su negocio la venta de recargas a celulares, ya que sus clientes en las visitas le han solicitado este producto. Ella espera que con este incremento en su oferta pueda mejorar sus ingresos para pagar sus deudas y además un día poder realizar sus ventas en su domicilio para dedicarle más tiempo  a su familia y mejorar el estilo de vida que mantienen en la actualidad. Para esta inversión, Elsa requiere un préstamo con el que realizará el primer pago para el negocio de la venta de recargas para celulares además que comprará algunos productos al por mayor para que reciba más descuentos y poder competir en precio. Elsa ya había realizado un crédito con Fundación Alternativa y siempre cumplió con sus pagos y a ella le llamó mucho la atención la agilidad y apoyo que brindan para clientes emprendedores como ella.
texts.en:
Elsa is 36 years old, and comes from a family of few economic resources. She was only able to complete elementary school, since she got married when she was very young and had to take care of household duties. Her limited education also affected her knowledge of family planning, and she had her first son when she herself was still a teenager. She now has three children, two of whom are grown and one of whom still depends on her. Elsa is married to Oswaldo, who is 43 years old, and is a mason by profession. He works on contract, so when work is scarce, so is family income.

Elsa lives with her husband and son in the parish of Río Verde, a historic area of Santo Domingo, the capital of the province of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, Ecuador. In recent years, the province has enjoyed steady economic growth, and the capital city of Santo Domingo has become known for its delicious fruits and cuisine. As a growing business hub, the area has become a land port of sorts between the mountain and coastal regions of the country. Santo Domingo also boasts a variety of tourist attractions and a warm climate, making it a popular destination for national and international visitors. In this changing, growing culture, many of the native people have taken up jobs in industries related to tourism.

Seeing the needs of her family for additional income, Elsa decided to start a business selling cosmetics and imitation jewelry. She started her business six years ago, and she travels around visiting her customers and selling various products. Elsa wants to expand her business to include the sales of prepaid cards for cell phone minutes, since her customers have asked her if she could provide that service, too. 

Elsa hopes that, with this expansion of her business, she can improve the overall quality of services she offers to her clients. In turn, she also hopes that this improvement will generate additional income to help her pay off debts and free up more time for her to spend with her family. Elsa plans to use the support from this loan to launch the cell phone credit portion of her business, as well as purchase cosmetics and jewelry in bulk for resale, since bulk purchase prices give her the greatest profit margins. She has received a  previous loan from Fundación Alternativa, and has a great track record of prompt repayments. Elsa is grateful for this opportunity, and for all the support she has received.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and products with good profit margins for resale at her business.

loans.name: Edgar Rene

texts.es:
El joven Edgar Rene esta soltero, tiene  27 años de edad, cursó los grado de bachillerato, se dedica ala fabricación de muebles, que son roperos, mesas, sillas, closed, ventanas, puertas y otros. inicio este trabajo siendo trabajadora para otro negocio, hasta el momento lleva 6 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que sera utilizado para la compra de materiales, madera, pinturas, bisagras, etc, espera en el futuro tener una mueblería mas grande y con trabajadores, y El ser el administrador solamente.
texts.en:
Edgar Rene is a 27-year-old young man, is single, and completed his high school education. He makes a living by making furniture, such as wardrobes, tables, chairs, closets, windows, doors, and other things. He started doing this work as an employee of another company. To date he has 6 years of experience.

He is asking for a loan that will be used to buy materials: wood, paints, hinges, etc. In the future he hopes to have a bigger furniture store with more workers, and to work just as the manager.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Felisa Margarita

texts.es:
La señora Felisa Margarita esta actualmente separada de su esposo, tiene 23 años de edad, cursó los 5 años de educación primaria, no tiene hijos, se dedica a la comercialización de típica para mujeres, este negocio lo inicio por la mamá que le brindo apoyo de un poco de capital, gracias a ellos ha logrado trabajar con esmero y lleva hasta el momento 5 años de experiencia.

Esta solicitando un prestamos que sera utilizado para la compra de mercadería, y así surtir su venta, para atraer mas clientes, y tener aun mas capital para manejar su negocio, espera en el futuro tener otros puestos de venta y así apoyar a su familia que tanto le han apoyado.
texts.en:
Señora Felisa Margarita is now separated from her husband. She is 23 years old and completed 5 years of primary education. She has no children. Her work is selling typical clothing for women. She began this business through her mother, who offered her support through a little capital. Thanks to this she has managed to work conscientiously and now has 5 years of experience.

She is applying for a loan that will be used to buy merchandise and thus stock her supply to attract more customers and to have even more capital to operate her business. She hopes in the future to have other sales stands and thus help her family, which has helped her so much.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Palmeras Palestina Group

texts.es:
La señora Isabel esta casada, tiene 55 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 8 hijos de los cuales 6 están estudiando, se dedica al comercio de ropa de segunda mano, lo cual lo compra en diferente lugares, para luego ajustarlos y venderlos, inicio este negocio gracia al apoyo de su familia, hasta el momento lleva 10 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la agricultura.  

Organiza un grupo y solicitar un préstamo que utilizara para la compra de mercadería para venta, quiere comprar cortes, guipiles, fajas, sabanas, etc. Espera en el futuro tener un negocio amplio y que su hijos sean personas con un titulo académico.
texts.en:
Isabel is 55 years old, married and has 8 children, six of whom are studying.  She did not have the opportunity to study and works selling second-hand clothing.  She buys the clothing in different places and then alters and sells it.  She started this business with the support of her family and now has 10 years of experience with it.  Her husband, who works in farming, helps her.

She has organized a group and is applying for a loan that she will use to buy merchandise to sell.  She wants to buy traditional hand-woven clothing, traditional tunics and blouses, woven belts and sashes, and sheets, among other things.  She hopes in the future to have a large business and that her children will have academic degrees.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell products such as traditional hand-woven clothing

loans.name: Mujeres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Trabajadoras, se llama el excelente grupo de mujeres, integrado por 15 mujeres Emprendedoras, de la ciudad de Itá, gracias al trabajo de todas las mujeres están en su sexto ciclo y siguen creciendo.
Una de estas mujeres es Nadia, quien por medio de la venta de bebidas ha podido ir creciendo y trabajando. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que con el correr del tiempo y gracias a su trabajo quiere salir adelante.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de bebidas de todo tipo, como ser gaseosas, vinos, cervezas y demás insumos para poder seguir creciendo como microempresaria.
texts.en:
Mujeres Trabajadoras (Working Women) is a women's communal bank comprised of 15 entrepreneurs in the city of Itá. The group, thanks to its members hard work, is in its sixth loan cycle and continues growing.

Nadia, one of the members, has been able to keep growing her beverage business. She works very hard and over time wants to get ahead through her business. She applied for this loan to buy all kinds of beverages such as soda, wine, and beer and other supplies to keep growing her micro business.

loans.use: to buy soda, wine, beer, and other supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La Sra Juana tiene 52 años y tiene una peluquería en su casa, además tiene 2 casa que alquila, y con ese trabajo está saliendo adelante.
Ella es una persona que desde siempre se ha esforzado y por medio de ese esfuerzo ha podido cumplir sus metas y quiere poder seguir haciéndolo. El préstamo que solicitó es para poner en condición una de las casa que utiliza para alquilar, como ser tejas, ladrillos y cemento.
Ella necesita de todo esto, ya que por medio de esto tiene los medios necesarios para poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en: Juana is 52 and has a hair salon in her house and owns two houses that she rents. She is prospering with these businesses. She has always worked hard and has been able to accomplish her goals; she wants to continue doing so. She is applying for a loan to buy tiles, bricks, and cement to remodel one of her rented houses. She needs these materials so that she can keep growing.

loans.use: to buy tiles, bricks, cement, and other materials.

loans.name: San Jose Group

texts.es:
Las integrantes de este comité  se dedican a variadas actividades. Este comité se encuentra en su 5 ciclo en donde se puede destacar el sentido de responsabilidad y los deseos de progresar que tienen  cada una de las integrantes.
Una de ellas es la Sra. Blasida, quien es la presidenta de este grupo, y quien siempre trata de poder ayudar a sus amigas en todo lo que puede, es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante y ser mejor. Ella se dedica a la costura y solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas e hilos, ya que tiene pedidos con los que quiere cumplir, pues sabe que eso le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The members of this communal bank engage in a variety of activities. The group is in its fifth loan cycle, and the sense of responsibility and desire to get ahead on the part of each member is noteworthy. Blasida is a member and president of the communal bank. She always tries to help her friends in whatever way she can. She wants very much to get ahead and be a better person. 

Blasida is a seamstress and is applying for this loan to buy fabric and thread so that she can fill customer orders. She knows that this loan will be a great help to her.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Natividad De Maria Group

texts.es:
El comité es un grupo muy activo y se encuentra en el ciclo 1º y quieren por medio del trabajo de todas, poder seguir creciendo y saliendo adelante, para que por medio de ese trabajo ayuden a sus familias.
La Sra. Nidia es la tesorera del grupo , y siempre sabe  llevar bien adelante su puesto , ella es vendedora de ropas tales como remeras, pantalones, camisas etc.,  y con el tiempo ella desea abrir  su propio negocio con su esfuerzo y también gracias a la  Fundación.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas de todo tipo, y de esa forma seguir teniendo buena variedad de prendas que poder ofrecer a sus clientes, ya que es la única forma de poder seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
This communal bank is very active and is in its first loan cycle. The group wants to keep growing and prospering with all the members' work so that they can help their families. Nidia is the bank's treasurer and has managed this position well. She sells clothing such as t shirts, pants, and shirts. 

In time, with effort, and thanks to the Foundation, she hopes to open her own business. She is applying for a loan to buy all kinds of clothing so that she can offer her customers a wide selection and be able to keep working.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: San Expedito Group

texts.es:
El comité se formo con la union de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní. El comité se denomina San Expedito están en el quinto Ciclo con 11  integrantes, es un grupo que se destaca  en el barrio por ser muy unidas, solidarias y responsable, las integrantes poseen un gran espíritu emprendedor.
Una de estas mujeres es la Sra. Adelaida quien vende prendas de todo tipo. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y comenta que con la ayuda de su grupo ha podido ir creciendo y  mejorando mucho su negocio. Ella desea seguir creciendo e invirtiendo en su negocio y es por ello que solicita de este crédito, para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas de verano, para seguir cumpliendo con los pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en:
This communal bank was formed by several neighbors in the city of Santaní. It is called San Expedito and is in its 15th loan cycle. The group's 11 members are known in the neighborhood as being close, caring, and responsible, and all of them have an entrepreneurial spirit.

Adelaida, one of the members, sells many kinds of clothing. She is hardworking and says that, with the group's help, she has been able to grow and improve her business. She wants to keep expanding and investing in her business. So, she is applying for a loan to buy summer clothing to fill her customer orders.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Segun

texts.en:
BlueOcean Energy and Technology Services is a subsidiary of BlueOcean Nigeria, an organisation that was incorporated in 2007 and targeted specifically at the base of the pyramid (BoP) markets in Nigeria. In view of the huge potential that the company identified for energy services, especially in rural areas, BlueOcean Energy started business in 2011 as a social enterprise to promote access to clean energy for rural poor and households in Nigeria. 

The founder of BlueOcean, Segun, has worked extensively in providing services to low end clients and one of the pioneers of microfinance banking in the country. With over 18 years of banking experience and four years of promoting financial inclusion, he identified a major challenge facing the huge populace that live below $2 per day, that of energy poverty. In Nigeria, about 60% of the population does not have access to electricity and this figure can be as high as 90% in rural areas, mostly not connected to the grid. With a population of over 160 million people and unreliable grid electricity below 4,000 MW, it has become urgent to provide alternative solutions to meet the overwhelming energy challenge of most especially rural communities. In addition, there is the constant increase in the price of fossil fuel such as the kerosene and electricity tariff, which has made further access to energy for the poor less likely. This has been the motivation of BlueOcean Energy to foray into the distribution of solar portable lanterns and solar kits to replace the use of kerosene lanterns most especially. The founder has carried out various pilot tests of these technologies in various rural communities in Nigeria, including using his mother to test the impact of replacing kerosene lanterns with solar lanterns with the accompanying economic, social and environmental impacts. 

To ensure the sustainability of the project, BlueOcean has developed a business model that will ensure partnership with women's groups, cooperatives, associations and microfinance institutions to make available solar solutions to a large number of beneficiaries, rather than individual sales of products. This model has incorporated microcredit for clients that will ensure expenditures spent on kerosene are used as a yardstick to determine periodic repayment for kits, with some savings. Also, the model will create energy micro entrepreneurs who will market solar lamps, thereby creating jobs in the rural areas and reduce rural-urban migration. Segun has engaged various stakeholders such as Solar Sister, women groups, NGOs, microfinance institutions, governments, policy makers and so on towards achieving large scale distribution of solar lamps in Nigeria. 

The loan will be utilised to purchase Barefoot Power products for distribution in rural areas to achieve the triple bottom line of economic, social and environmental impacts in such communities.

loans.use: to buy and sell Barefoot Power's solar lighting products.

loans.name: Marcos

texts.es:
El Señor Marcos tiene 39 años es Taxista vive en la Ciudad de Coronel Oviedo. Esta casado con la Sra. Nélida desde  hace mas de 17 años.
Comenta además que son una familia muy trabajadora todos se ayudan mutuamente para salir adelante. El Señor Marcos comenta que se gano con mucho esfuerzo todo lo que hasta ahora esta teniendo ya que dejo a su familia  y se fue a España por tres años y estando allá mando la plata para comprar para su taxi, y ahora solicita de este crédito para la compra de una moto, que le ayudará también en su negocio.
Agradece por la ayuda que está recibiendo, pues le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en: Marcos is a 39-year-old taxi driver. He lives in the city of Coronel Oviedo. He has been married to his wife Nélida for over 17 years. He says that besides the fact that his family is hardworking, they all help each other to get ahead. Marcos says that he painstakingly earned everything that he has up to this point, considering that he left his family and went to Spain for 3 years, and while there, sent money home in order to buy his taxi. Presently, he is applying for this loan to buy a motorbike that will also help his business. He is grateful for the assistance that he is receiving since it will be very helpful.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Silverio

texts.es:
El Sr. Silverio vive en su casa de la ciudad de Luque, es casado. Tiene un comedor y una pequeña despensa desde el año 1992, en su comedor y despensa le ayudan su señora e hijos respectivamente. El préstamo que solicita es para invertir en compra de fideos, arroz, yerba, azúcar y otros alimentos para su despensa y su comedor.
El es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora, que con el tiempo y con su esfuerzo quiere salir adelante y ser un gran microemprendedor. Agradece por la ayuda que está recibiendo, pues le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Silverio lives in his house in the city of Luque and is married. He has had a restaurant and small store since 1992. His wife and children help him in his restaurant and store. The loan that he is requesting is to invest in the purchase of noodles, rice, herbs, sugar, and other foods for his store and restaurant. 

He is a very hard-working and entrepreneurial person, who with time and effort wants to move forward and be a great micro-entrepreneur. He is grateful for the help that he is receiving, and the loan will be of much help.

loans.use: to buy noodles, rice, herbs, sugar, and other ingredients.

loans.name: 8 De Diciembre Group

texts.es:
El comité de nombre, 8 DE DICIEMBRE son 13 señoras que poseen diversas actividades. También está la Sra. Inocencia que cuenta con un tambo, en donde suministra leche, elabora queso, panes, etc. Ella es una persona con muchos deseos de salir adelante y es por ello que se esfuerza al máximo para salir adelante y poder ayudar a su familia por medio de ese esfuerzo. Ella solicita de este crédito para invertirlo en la compra de herramientas, muebles para mejorar el negocio, y demás, para poder seguir trabajando y ofreciendo un buen producto a sus clientes.
En la foto hay mas miembros, ya que el grupo tiene personas que las ayudan, pero que no estan retirando en este momento ningún crédito.
texts.en:
The committee, 8 de Diciembre (December 8), is comprised of 13 women who do diverse activities. Inocencia has a small dairy farm, where she provides milk, makes cheese, bread, etc. She is a person with the desire to move forward and because of that she is making the effort to the maximum to move forward and be able to help her family through that effort. She is requesting this loan in order to invest it in the purchase of tools, furniture to improve the business, and move, in order to be able to continue working and offering a good product to her customers. 

In the photo there are more members, given that the group has people who help them, but who are not applying for a loan at this time.

loans.use: to buy tools, furniture to improve the business, and more.

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
Actualmente el comité se encuentra en el 7º ciclo con 16 integrantes. Son señoras que se esfuerzan y tienen sus labores del día a día para salir adelante y solventar los gastos diarios del hogar. La intención de ellas fue formar parte del comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras con el fin de lograr mejorar sus emprendimientos y calidad de vida.
La Sra. Lurdes es una de las integrantes que se esmera muchísimo para poder ayudar a su familia, ella se dedica exclusivamente en la venta de bebidas en su casa, ya cuenta con  sus clientes formados, ella está muy contenta por formar parte del  programa Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras  dice que  su actividad es muy provechosa ya que nota el progreso de su familia.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de bebidas, para que de esa forma pueda seguir teniendo buena variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Currently the committee is in its 7th cycle with 16 members. They are women who make the effort and do work day by day in order to move forward and pay for the daily expenses of the home. Their intention was to form part of the committee of Women Entrepreneurs with the goal of achieving the improvement of their undertakings and quality of life. 

Lurdes is one of the members who is trying very hard to be able to help her family. She exclusively works in the sale of beverages from her house. She already has formed a customer base. She is very happy to be part of the Committee of Women Entreprenuers. She says that this activity is very useful, and notes the progress of her family. 

She is requesting this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of beverages, so that she can continue having a good variety to offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy beverages in order to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Dinamicas Group

texts.es:
El comité  Mujeres Dinamicas, se conformo con la iniciativa de la señora Monica que se mostró muy interesada por el programa.
Este comité se encuentra en el segundo ciclo, están aprendiendo la importancia de trabajar en equipo dentro de un grupo con responsabilidad, honestidad y comunicación, demuestran conciencia por el compromiso asumido con el comité como también con la Fundación.
Todas las miembros se dedican a la cría y venta de animales de corral, como ser gallinas, chanchos, cabras y demás, y con gran esfuerzo y sumado a la ayuda de la fundación están saliendo adelante.
Monica, solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de balanceados que podrá dar a sus animales, y de esa forma poder darles un buen cuidado para después venderlos
texts.en:
The committee Dynamic Women was formed by Monica's initiative, who was very interested in the program. This committee is in the second cycle. They are learning the importance of working as a team within a group with responsibility, honesty, and communication. They show awareness for the commitment that they have taken on with the committee and also with the Foundation. All of the members are dedicated to the raising and selling of farm animals, like chickens, pigs, goats, and more, and with a great effort and the added help of the foundation, they are moving forward. 

Monica is requesting this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of animal feed that she will be able to give to her animals, and in this way be able to give them good care to be able to sell them afterward.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Mabel Isabel

texts.es: La Sra. Mabel  sigue con la misma actividad de la venta de variedad de zapatos cuenta que le fue muy bien con el crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de zapatos por mayor, ahora en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de variedad de mercadería como zapatos deportivos.  para surtir su negocio, ya que desea brindar variedad de productos a su clientela.
texts.en:
Sra. Mabel continues her business of selling a variety of shoes. She did very well with the loan she obtained for buying shoes in bulk.

On this occasion, she is now requesting a loan so that she can buy a variety of merchandise, such as sports shoes, to restock her business. She wants to offer a variety of products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy sports shoes in bulk.

loans.name: San Ramon Group

texts.es:
El comité San Ramon esta en el cuarto ciclo vienen trabajando muy bien en forma conjunta en la comunidad organizando actividades para fortalecer el comité. También se ayudan en la colocación de sus productos. Se destacan en la zona por el espíritu emprendedor.
Todas las miembros se dedican a la cría y venta de animales de corral, y por medio de este sacrificado trabajo salen adelante. Simona solicita de este crédito para la compra de balanceados para poder seguir trabajando y dando a su familia lo que necesitan.
texts.en:
The communal bank "San Roman" is in their fourth loan cycle. They have been working very well together organizing activities in the community in order to strengthen the communal bank. They also help one another with product placement. They stand out in the area for their entrepreneurial spirit. 
All of the members breed and sell farm animals, and through this demanding work, they are able to get ahead. Simona is requesting this loan in order to buy animal feed to be able to keep working and give her family what it needs.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Virgen De Lourdes Group

texts.es:
